products.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers, 24 Count, Alphabet Soup Design, Size 4

reviews.name: Hou
reviews.title: Good diapers, super cute, reasonable price
reviews.review: My favorite diaper has been Huggies Special Delivery. However they are on the pricier side. This one is comparable to Huggies and more affordable. I like how thin they are while is absorbent enough. My baby hasn't have any issue with leaking yet. I hope they can have more patterns available on Amazon. The Hello Bello website strangely didn't work and there are way more patterns there.

reviews.name: Ali
reviews.title: Good baby diapers
reviews.review: These are good baby diapers if u only use them during the day when u are awake and going to change baby constantly. If the baby does pee in these multiple times these dippers will leak. So i would not recommend using them at night if baby sleeps for long periods of time or u will have a mess. I would use huggies for night time dippers or another name brand.

reviews.name: Bumblebee
reviews.title: For baby
reviews.review: My niece really likes these

reviews.name: Jill Fleming
reviews.title: Absorbent- comfortable
reviews.review: Great value and absorbent- good for overnight protection-

reviews.name: Devin Kennedy
reviews.title: Compares well to big brands
reviews.review: I love that these are eco-friendly! No blow outs or leaks and they have a great texture to them. They feel soft and comfortable for baby. I chose not to rebuy due to the higher cost but they were perfect for the sensitive newborn phase. (Adorable patterns are a bonus!)

reviews.name: Pam
reviews.title: Wow
reviews.review: These diapers were great! I didn’t experience any leaks while trying these out nor blow outs!!! These diapers are incredibly soft and have the cutest pattern! I have been a pamper mom for years, but these switched me! My biggest complaint is that size 1 and Newborn sizes of these are almost impossible to find in store! They are always sold out! That is the indication of a really great/ high quality diaper!

reviews.name: Kat
reviews.title: Quality
reviews.review: Bought these because my brother(father of 2 girls) uses them I love how soft they are they do hold a lot of pee. They do not have a blow out pocket in the back and they did not keep my LO dry. But over all they fit my curvy baby perfectly and they work well

reviews.name: Morgan Walsh
reviews.title: Super sensitive tush
reviews.review: My granddaughter has sensitive skin and gets diaper rash easily. I’ve gone through so many different diapers and finally these she used all of and never got a rash. I find that most diapers will be ok at first but as we continue to use them she gets irritated skin. Not with these diapers though! We’ve used two boxes now with zero issues!

reviews.name: Luke Miller
reviews.title: Great gift
reviews.review:
Bought as a gift for a baby shower

What you see in product image and description is what you will get

You will get diapers and the amount shown in image
Great price

reviews.name: Leigha
reviews.title: Love
reviews.review: We love our Hello Bello diapers! I love knowing that I am putting a quality and safe product on my baby and not breaking the bank!

reviews.name: Kayla
reviews.title: Favorite brand
reviews.review: Always my go to brand. I trust the product and what it's made of as well as that there's no explosions that leak

reviews.name: Amanda
reviews.title: Top diaper brand
reviews.review: Love this brand! Slightly expensive but for natural diapers I expect to pay more. Can get on sale sometimes & may look into a subscription

reviews.name: Helena
reviews.title: Cutest diapers
reviews.review: These are so adorable, everyone that sees them think they’re so cute. The watermelons are my fave design.

reviews.name: Ezra Salsky
reviews.title: Cute diapers, sizing runs abit big
reviews.review: These were the cutest patterned diapers! Sizing was a bit bigger than other brands that I used before. Used these overnight and didnt have any leaks.

reviews.name: Elizabeth Hayes
reviews.title: Incredibly soft and absorbent
reviews.review: The absorbency from these diapers are unmatched by other brands I’ve used. I use the watermelon print it’s cute, soft, and absorbs well. I love the for overnight especially but they are perfect for all the time. I highly recommend

reviews.name: MsTina03
reviews.title: What I was looking for
reviews.review: I purchased these for a gift. I used them in a themed gift basket. It turned out great and the expecting mom was excited about the basket

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Favorite diapers
reviews.review: Favorite diapers. Fit great. No leaks. No smell or plastic chemical feel. Like that they come in small packs.

reviews.name: AmazonCustomer
reviews.title: Work great, great price
reviews.review: Diapers are way too expensive! These work great and are a great price too.

reviews.name: Shannon Cannon
reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review: Love these amd the price is great. They fit well and don't leak.

reviews.name: Ashley
reviews.title: The best diapers
reviews.review: The only diapers that don’t leak! Super soft too!

reviews.name: Frozen6523
reviews.title: Love them for my baby
reviews.review: They work great, very then but absorbent! Which makes it easier to carry more diapers when out and about with baby.

reviews.name: Camarillo Fam
reviews.title: Cute!!
reviews.review: So cute, we will be using disposable diapers for the first two months and then switching to cloth so we are giving this brand a go!

reviews.name: T Smith
reviews.title: The best natural diapers for the price.
reviews.review: Used these with 2 babies now and they are the best!

reviews.name: Jimmi Jones
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: They work pretty good so far I have not had any problem with that brand.

reviews.name: Nicole Acosta

reviews.review: Good quality and very absorbent

reviews.name: Natalia Ponce

reviews.review: Not the best diapers but it’s able to hold for about 4 hours at night depending how much you’re kid goes

reviews.name: Imb
reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review: Good quantity for price, no issues with leaking or pilling. Soft material & no sagging

reviews.name: Cris
reviews.title: New baby
reviews.review: Good value

reviews.name: Cindy Little
reviews.title: Grandma says these are great diapers!
reviews.review: My granddaughter was coming for a visit and my son and daughter-in-law said Hello Bello diapers were the best and the only ones they use. They were excellent! No leakage and kept her comfortable. I recommend them!

reviews.name: H
reviews.title: Works
reviews.review: Love the variety

reviews.name: Sue
reviews.title: Quality diapers
reviews.review: Good price.

reviews.name: Jenna S.
reviews.title: Gift
reviews.review: Great diapers, cute designs and affordable

reviews.name: Rae Figgemeier
reviews.title: Good value
reviews.review: Good price and the quality seems decent. Cute prints also!

reviews.name: Melissa Arenas
reviews.title: Best pampers so far!!
reviews.review: Good quality, strong sturdy pamper. Good absorption

reviews.name: JudyT
reviews.title: Hypoallergenic for baby who was allergic to other brands.
reviews.review: This was a gift.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: It was a gift
reviews.review: They were a gift.

reviews.name: DEBRA Y
reviews.title: Great that they made a diaper that's without all the bad chemicals that's affordable !
reviews.review: Affordable, low chemical diaper!!!

reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.title: Adorable!
reviews.review: Cute & soft on baby bottom!

reviews.name: Amanda
reviews.title: As expected, they are diapers (and solid ones).
reviews.review:
The packaging was literally just the diapers no box with the shipping label slapped on so it got dinged up more so than the first time I ordered but the items inside are perfectly safe and usable. I’m just happy it wasn’t rainy out during the delivery since there are snags and holes in the plastic wrap from being tossed around in shipping. I am curious if I order directly from the hello Bello website if my products will receive the same weird treatment.

Points for the cute prints as always. Points for being a reliable and affordable diaper.

reviews.name: Kristin
reviews.title: Buy them!
reviews.review: Ever washed a dirty diaper in the laundry? Ever been pissed because it broke apart all over your clothes? Well look no further……. I washed a hello hello diaper last load. Completely in tact, never lost a single bead. 10/10 recommend for the simple fact that ever mom deserves a little less of a mess!

reviews.name: Johnna
reviews.title: Soft and Absorbent
reviews.review: We got these for a really great discount and may end up switching over full-time. These are super soft, great on my baby’s sensitive bottom and have had not leaks!

reviews.name: Ariel
reviews.title: I love HelloBello
reviews.review: My daughter is 3 months! For my baby shower I had gotten a few different brands and I like HelloBello the best! Not only because of how good they are for babies but it’s a great quality too! The price also helps ALOT! Had no issues with leakage!

reviews.name: Tanya R Conway
reviews.title: Excellent Diapers With Fun Patterns
reviews.review: I loved these diapers when my grandson was in them. Now I'm buying them for other family members to use with their newborns. Best diapers on the market imo.

reviews.name: Claudette Gamboa
reviews.title: Good for baby
reviews.review: These diapers are very nice and they’re true to size and very absorbent. I recommend them

reviews.name: Jarissa P.
reviews.title: Favorite diapers!
reviews.review: These are our go to diapers for sensitivity and quality! Try the wipes too! I'd have to say we like these more than huggies!

reviews.name: Em genesis
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.review: Worked for my newborn

reviews.name: Jessica Gibson
reviews.title: I liked these better
reviews.review: I disliked the newborn size but the bigger sizes work really good. They are also really cute.

reviews.name: Michelle Smith
reviews.title: Very good for price
reviews.review: These are very good diapers for the price

reviews.name: Marina
reviews.title: Cute diapers
reviews.review: Cute and work well for my 9.5 lb, 2 month old

reviews.name: Eric & Simone
reviews.title: Ok product
reviews.review: We got the diapers because we loved the Wipes so much, but the elastic part is just like all the other brands. Our child gets rashes from these elastic so we had to get another type of diaper. 4 stars because the inside absorbs really well and it's soft to the touch.

reviews.name: Faith
reviews.title: Decent for price
reviews.review: I ordered 3 packs of size 1 and one pack was smaller than the other two. We’ve also had a few leaks, definitely not super absorbent but good on my babies skin

reviews.name: dominic D carter
reviews.title: Made a birthday cake out of diapers.
reviews.review: Low rise diapers, not soft

reviews.name: Samantha Irene Ferm
reviews.title: not effective with poo
reviews.review: they're cute but he blew through 3 of them in 3 days. gonna try Kirkland from Costco next. fingers crossed.

reviews.name: Alex Keller
reviews.title: Wrong Size
reviews.review: I've been using HB diapers since November and got these for Christmas, 2 package of size 1s and I opened them this week and they are size 2s. NOW I will say that it was time to move her up but I was using what I had so it kind of worked out for me. BUT other comments have said that they think the quality of these aren't the same as purchasing from the Hello Bello website directly. Not sure what's going on here though with the incorrect sizes??

reviews.name: teo miller
reviews.title: Medium Quality
reviews.review: We have been using this diaper but compared to quality ones, this one should have only 3 stars.

reviews.name: sofia castagna
reviews.title: Calidad basica
reviews.review: Los compre para un viaje porque venían en pack pequeño. Su calidad no me encanto, es como acartonado y si bien absorbe no es lo que mas me gusta para mi bebe. Te resuelve, no es un mal pañal, pero si buscas un algodón suave para la colita de tu bebe no te lo recomiendo.

reviews.name: Roxanne
reviews.title: Super cute looking but don’t hold up well
reviews.review: I bought these because they were on such a good deal and they are super cute. However, I usually use target brand up and up and compared to these, target diapers blow these out of the water. The absorbency in the hello bello diapers just isn’t there. I would not buy them again

reviews.name: amanda
reviews.title: Actually disappointed
reviews.review: I bought hello bello from Walmart and liked them. I switched between hello bello and honest..well this pack I ordered from Amazon seems huge compared to the other size ones I got from Walmart..I’ve had more blowouts than I have in the past 3 months…assuming it is because they are larger than the others. Also one diaper had some sort of spots in it so I ended up throwing away the rest. Definitely disappointed in hello bello after I thought I found an affordable safe diaper for my baby girl

reviews.name: Bree H.
reviews.title: Stinky Diaper!
reviews.review: I have been using Huggies special delivery but I wanted to try HB. I love the location of the leak guards on the HB diapers. I was impressed with how much pee and poop these diapers hold considering how thin they feel! No leaks! My only complaint, the diapers themselves smell chemical like. I can't pin point the scent but it was disappointing to smell such a strong industrial/warehouse/chemical based smell from the diapers. It was intense enough that I won't be buying them again 😩

reviews.name: Olive Stewart
reviews.title: Might have received an old product
reviews.review: I ordered a pack of the building blocks size 1 and they might have been an old package because the sizing is completely off! We were waiting for our subscription box and decided to order these while we waited. They are soooo tiny which we confirmed once we received our grinch box. They leaked from all sides, and barely stretched.

reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.title: Not the softest, paper like softness
reviews.review: Highly recommended to me but they weren’t soft at all. They felt like paper they were so thin. They are affordable & held up well but the softness quality wasn’t for me.

reviews.name: Megan S.
reviews.title: Constant leaks
reviews.review: I bought one pack of these to try out and wanted to love them… affordable, hypoallergenic, and cute.. but they run so small, are super thin, and leak constantly. We ended up having to change my baby’s clothes every 2-3hrs during the day and I won’t use them at night. I’m so bummed but these just don’t cut it.

reviews.name: chloe asanon
reviews.title: Rough
reviews.review: A little bigger compared to pampers sizing but they are rough they rubbed my newborn a little to hard right under her belly

reviews.name: D D.
reviews.title: Cute but leaks
reviews.review: I bought these because the price is amazing compared to other cute diapers BUT the leak. I don't enjoy changing clothes every diaper change so unfortunately I won't buy again.

reviews.name: AM
reviews.title: Different pattern
reviews.review: Ordered the diapers with a cute animal pattern to make a diaper for a baby shower…received diapers with letters on them… I know they will work the same but the aesthetic is off

reviews.name: Evelyn
reviews.title: Not as effective as other brand
reviews.review: Have only used two, both were fails. These are the same size as the ones that we tend to use by Pampers but unfortunately Hello Bello did not prevent leaks. Not satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.name: jandreas
reviews.title: Not the most absorbant for overnight
reviews.review: Leaked a lot no matter how I adjusted the waist and legs.

reviews.name: Nia
reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review: Sticks to my baby’s behind.

reviews.name: Alivia Isler
reviews.title: Do not absorb anything
reviews.review: I ordered these in a size one and they do not absorb like at all they leaked so bad on my son..

reviews.name: Shannon
reviews.title: Insanely over priced
reviews.review: Usually like hello bello but this was incredibly over priced and arrived so late

reviews.name: Amanda Gabehart
reviews.title: Not enough absorbency
reviews.review: Very soft but doesn’t provide much leakage protection.

reviews.name: Lacey
reviews.title: Almost leaks/blowouts everytime
reviews.review: I received these as a part of my baby shower diaper raffle. But these diapers tend to almost blow out or leak everytime I’ve used them. I will be thankful once they are gone. They also are way to big for a newborn who is 6lbs 13oz. The flap overlaps so much

reviews.name: Gloria Gavidia
reviews.title: Didn’t work for my 1 month old
reviews.review:
Unfortunately this brand didn’t work for us.
-they can only hold so much
-if diaper wet and baby poops, IT WILL come out their backs
-you can barely see the line
-irritated my baby’s skin
-For best results change diaper every 40 minutes-1 hr.

The only good thing is the cute presentation but doesn’t do what it’s supposed to.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Cute but Leaky
reviews.review: These diapers sure are cute and I was excited to try them. Unfortunately they are very leaky. They are quite long and narrow in shape. The front isn’t wide enough to cover properly and there isn’t a poop catcher at the back to help stop leaks from going up the back. Going up a size doesn’t work because then they are even longer and gape around the legs or have lots of material at the belly. Save your laundry and go with a trusted brand instead.

reviews.name: Evelyn
reviews.title: Not as effective as other brand
reviews.review: Have only used two, both were fails. These are the same size as the ones that we tend to use by Pampers but unfortunately Hello Bello did not prevent leaks. Not satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.name: jandreas
reviews.title: Not the most absorbant for overnight
reviews.review: Leaked a lot no matter how I adjusted the waist and legs.

reviews.name: Nia
reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review: I bought these to hold me over while my Hello Bello subscription shipped because I was too lazy to go to Walmart. They are significantly smaller than the ones in the subscription and do not fit my daughter. Go up a size or go to Walmart!

reviews.name: Terry
reviews.title: They leak - look elsewhere
reviews.review: Compared to other competitors, these perform the worst. Between Pampers, 7th generation, the other subscription diapers, milly moon, etc, these performed the worse. They were better at one point, but as recent as sept/oct 2023, the quality really took a nosedive.

reviews.name: Sarah Flick
reviews.title: SCAM!! DO NOT BUY
reviews.review:
This is only 24 diapers- not a pack or case!
I thought this was a 2pack- it’s not, and I desperately needed diapers for a trip I was on. DO NOT BUY!

reviews.name: Amanda
reviews.title: no absorbency
reviews.review: i wish i had read the reviews before purchasing. i honestly don’t know how these diapers have a near perfect 5 star rating. the diapers are cute and relatively inexpensive, but i’d rather put that money towards target brand overnight diapers. this brand has zero absorbency, and every single time i’ve had my 9 week old in this diaper, he’s had leaks. super frustrating.

reviews.name: montel
reviews.title: Worst diapersl
reviews.review: They were terrible too thin a waste of money did not help keep the baby dry at all all it took was a little water the quality was terrible I will not be recommending them and I would not be buying anymore

reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.title: Leaks and Thin
reviews.review: I was excited to try these diapers, but was disappointed to see how thin they are. They’re thin, rough, and don’t absorb well at all. I sized up and my LO leaked out the sides every time I had him wear these diapers. He’s a newborn too, so isn’t even able to roll onto his side. I wouldn’t recommend these diapers.

reviews.name: Rachel C
reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review: Bought these as they were on sale for a great deal. Material was rough and did not seem like it would be comfortable for my baby. Leaked through the first few diapers and then gave up on them.

reviews.name: Upa
reviews.title: Cheap diaper
reviews.review: It doesn’t leak but the things inside breaks and will be all over babies butt. Not comfortable at all. Dnt know why they are allowed to even sell

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Product overpriced
reviews.review: Totally upset with purchase price...recently purchased 96 ct for same price...I thought this was a 96 ct item as well...total rip off...unhappy customer...Flosale is a ripoff

reviews.name: Shanna
reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.review: I didn’t feel like sending this back but it was the smallest package for the price of a box. Didn’t pay attention to that detail before ordering. Rio off. Sad sad sad

reviews.name: Beth
reviews.title: El peor pañal que he usado.en mi vida
reviews.review: He cambiado a mi hijo como 3 veses por que se pasa Ala ropa todo no lo compres es horrible

reviews.name: Anna
reviews.title: Not good at all 👎🏻
reviews.review: I was expecting more but this diaper doesn’t absorb well

reviews.name: Gracie Babcock
reviews.title: Leak every single time
reviews.review: Get these diapers if you want to change your baby’s clothes 4 times a day. I have tried several brands and this is the absolute worst. They are so thin and hold basically nothing. I have gotten poop and pee on me so many times and have a bunch of these left over that I will not use. Horrible.

reviews.name: ARose
reviews.title: Gold Medal in Leakage
reviews.review: We received several packs of these diapers at our baby shower and just got around to using them for our 6 week old. So far with Pampers or Huggies, he's only peed through or blown out of his diaper maybe 2 or 3 times per week. I tried Hello Bello diapers for the first time on him yesterday and every single diaper leaked to the point it seemed like they weren't even catching anything, requiring a wardrobe change with every diaper. I tried checking the waistband and the leg holes to make sure there was a seal every time I put a new diaper on him, but it made no difference. I swapped back to Pampers and the blowouts and leakage stopped. I won't be using these again. I'd donate them, but I don't want to subject others to the amount of clean up and laundry we have to do now. Just poor performance and caused more cleanup than necessary.

reviews.name: Caleb
reviews.title: Nope
reviews.review:
Tried these for one day after the Huggies ran out. After a full day of just using this brand and about 10 dipper changes my baby got dipper rash. I notice these do not stay dry even after a light pee. I touched the dipper just to see how wet it stays. This stays pretty moist. Keep that against the skin for a bit and bam you got dipper rash and a fussy baby.
They also do not have a back pocket for blow outs. The elastic around the legs are not as soft… I bet Kristin bell don’t even use these diapers on her own baby… they suk

reviews.name: Nvhsoccer
reviews.title: Leaks horribly
reviews.review: This brand does NOT absorb very much. It was a disaster and I kept trying but they kept leaking everywhere. I've also seen a test someone did at home seeing which diapers held without leaking and hello Bello was the WORST. I would never buy these or recommend them. I don't know about the rest of the products but if a diaper can't hold anything then I won't be trusting the rest on my newborn.

reviews.name: Sarah Provost
reviews.title: Cute designs horrible fit
reviews.review: I really wanted these diapers to work. But the way they designed the diapers they don’t fit or work with my baby. I have tried them on and off since she has been born and they just don’t fit her. I tried them the other day and they just fell off of her after 30 mins.

reviews.name: Dick Arch
reviews.title: Terrible quality control
reviews.review: Out of the 2 boxes we bought, 21 diapers were unusable due to the adhesive strap already being stuck to the diaper somewhere else. And boy when it’s 3 am and you throw two new diapers on the floor unused, with a screaming child in the background, choices get made. Like never buying these again. And they leak more than any other diaper we have used.

reviews.name: Angela
reviews.title: Leaky
reviews.review: I wanted to love these diapers, however, when I opened the pack, I noticed how small they were compared to the pampers brand. From the first diaper, my poor baby was wet. I decided to only use them during the day; they became useless when I had to also change his clothes, no leak protection. He had one blowout when I finally called it quits; 10 diapers in total were used.

reviews.name: Caro
reviews.title: Smell of Gasoline
reviews.review: Has anyone else had an issue when opening the bag? When I opened the bag of diapers it smelled like gas, it was very strong and unusual because I’ve never had this problem.

reviews.name: Sandy LeRoy
reviews.title: Leaked
reviews.review: I tried using this diaper on my baby 4 times. Each time the diaper leaked onto his clothes. Will be sticking with pampers.

reviews.name: Mimie
reviews.title: OVERHYPED
reviews.review:
THE WAY THE HOLD I WOULD NEVER BUY THESE AGAIN
TWO PISSES & YOU CAN FEEL THE PEE ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE DIAPER

products.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 1 (8-12 lbs) Superstars - 128 Count Value Pack of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Best diapers I've found
reviews.review: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these diapers! For the first time I actually subscribed to something. These diapers are better than any others in my opinion. No diaper rash, absolutely no blow outs or leaking, they actually fit my boy and even Huggies and pampers struggle to do that properly, they're cute, and eco friendly too! Best diapers for functionality, quality, fit, and cuteness all in one! I'll definitely be recommending to my mom friends and be a continuing customer for them!

reviews.name: tina pinchon
reviews.title: Quality and quantity
reviews.review: Hello Bello always delivers with a quality product! My favorite diapers!

reviews.name: Ang
reviews.title: Great quality - switched from Honest
reviews.review:
I was hesitant to switch from Honest to Hello Bello but I honestly am so impressed with the quality! These are just as absorbent as the Honest brand and have the same quality, no toxic chemicals, no fragrance. It is perfect. They have cute designs just like Honest does too and for a much better price! I’m happy I tried these for my baby.

I see people in the reviews complain about them not being as absorbent as they would like but personally, I would never keep my baby in even a wet diaper knowing he’s uncomfortable. I have an 11 week old baby that sleeps through the night and he doesn’t wake up in discomfort not once for diaper change but he also rarely soils the diaper at night.

Hope this helps other parents!

reviews.name: andrew rowe
reviews.title: nice diapers
reviews.review: pricey but awesome the wife and daughter think they are cute

reviews.name: Christina Wallace
reviews.title: We love Hello Bello!
reviews.review: We love Hello Bello! Tried many brands but stuck with HB. Overnight no issues or leaking. Definitely recommend

reviews.name: Domonique Williams
reviews.title: The best natural diapers
reviews.review: These are the best vegan diapers I have tried!! I highly recommend them. If you are coming from standard diaper like pampers or Huggies I do think they needed to be changed more often but no diaper rashes or irritation. And the patterns are so cute m!

reviews.name: Ger Marks
reviews.title: Premium diapers
reviews.review: Soft and really absorbant

reviews.name: HollyY
reviews.title: Love these
reviews.review: I love these diapers. They are not thick and don’t leak outside of the occasional baby blow out. Yes this happens with every child.

reviews.name: Zoey R
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review: Great diapers. Not the cheapest diaper but not too bad. The kids love the design options.

reviews.name: Jeannette Killingsworth
reviews.title: Hello Bello diapers
reviews.review: Great product for my g-baby with these being hard to find. Amazon came to the rescue. Thanks Amazon

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Best Diaper
reviews.review: Soft, cute, and best diapers!

reviews.name: Corey McCoy
reviews.title: Nice - soft - absorbent
reviews.review: These diapers are amazing! So soft and very absorbent. There was hardly any leakage and these were a great value for the money. My kid ran around like they had nothing on because they loved these diapers so much. I would recommend them!

reviews.name: Cesar C.
reviews.title: Holds well
reviews.review: These perform well for the intended use. Glad my baby did not get any reactions to these as I have experienced this with many brands. This is always in my mind as a parent. They don't fall off easy and hold well. I didn't get any spills but then again I try to be attentive about this when these were being used. I was not interested in color or design, I was more concerned with the functionality of the diapers. It performed well for me, so that is all that matters. These worked great for my baby hopefully it may do the same for yours. I recommend these as like everything else, these can add up in cost.

reviews.name: J. W.
reviews.title: No complaints using them on a new born
reviews.review: No complaints using them on a new born. The baby did not really put them to the test so hard to say how they handle the really tough jobs. They work fine, we may consider them in the future purely for the convenience of having them delivered.

reviews.name: Kevin
reviews.title: Diapers that stay secure and dry!
reviews.review: These diapers fit great and stay on with secure tape. They help to prevent leaks and blowouts. They feel comfortable against the skin.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Nice diaper, no leaks here!
reviews.review: I really like these diapers. I think they are a nice, soft, well fitting diaper for my daughter. They had a cute design on them, and they held up overnight. I didn’t experience any leaks while we used them. I think they were thicker then some others that I have used in the past as well. I would say for the price they are worth it.

reviews.name: dtmReviews
reviews.title: A Better Alternative to Toxic Diapers
reviews.review: My first kid got all the privileges of cloth diapering, but I got lax with the second and now with 3 kids pretty much only use disposables. As a 2-time cancer survivor, I try my hardest to keep toxins out of my kids' lives, & I've done tons of research into what chemical contents to avoid, bleaching processes, pulp, etc. I am especially wary of the PFAS (forever chemicals) that are now known to be ubiquitous endocrine disruptors. According to a trusted source, these diapers have tested non-detect for fluorine (ehich would be evidence of PFAS), have a plant-based liner and are free of fragrances and lotions. The only concern is that they do use ECF (elemental chlorine-free) pulp, which may not be entirely free of coloring and can still create disinfection byproducts. So these are not top-rated for non-toxicity but they are infinitely healthier than a lot of alternatives. One reason I am giving them five stars is that they do not offgas any smell when I immediately open the plastic, unlike another brand I was using of supposedly equal quality and safety. They also seem to fit my daughter better. The tabs do sometimes stick together on the unopened diapers, but I haven't accidentally torn any. Overall, if you are looking for a disposable that does not expose your child to the highly suspect chemicals and fragrances used by so many "trusted" Big brands, these diapers are a great, affordable way to go. I will be switching to this brand until I find one without ECF that is still affordable and manages to keep in stock.

reviews.name: Sharon S.
reviews.title: Good Option
reviews.review: Needed one more box while we transition from diapers to "big girl pants>. The convenience and cost of this option made this worth the risk. The Hello Bello Store diapers were a good surprise. They are soft and fit nicely to reduce leaks. They have held up to a very active 2 year old. I wish I had discovered these earlier. I hope to not have to purchase another box of diapers but if I do I will reorder these. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.name: Kris
reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review: These diapers are a great price and great product. We use honest diapers and they fit similar, but have switched to hello bello because they leak less.

reviews.name: Logan S. Merriam
reviews.title: Great quality diapers
reviews.review: I've only got one baby so it's hard to account for different body shapes in one review, but these fit as well as any diapers I've used on my 11lb girl. They're just a little roomy but that's to be expected since I got the 10-16lb sizes. The graphics are cute, they hold everything in really well, and she seems comfortable in them. Not really much more I could ask for.

reviews.name: LisKni
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: I got these sampled because they were a little expensive at the store. They were cute and okay but I'm used to huggies or parents choice. No blowouts though.

reviews.name: DERRICK M
reviews.title: Great quality diapers
reviews.review: Great quality diapers that are soft and comfortable. Highly recommended

reviews.name: M.G
reviews.title: Absorbent & Adorable!
reviews.review: Flower child is a simple and elegant design, appreciate the fact that these are chemical free. They are very gentle on my toddler's skin. No rashes its super soft and holds his pee well. Been using for almost a month, no leak yet. Good quality product.

reviews.name: AugustReviews
reviews.title: Premium diapers that hold well
reviews.review:
We often babysit a friend's toddler at our house, and she wears a size 6, so we picked these up to have for her after hearing great things from friends about them.

Glad we did; these are so soft, yet they hold a LOT - no leakage issues yet. The fit is pretty perfect, and they have a leak indicator that works as expected.

Haven't seen any kind of irritation or rashes from these which is another big plus.

They do come at a premium price but they seem well worth it. Would recommend if you're having skin issues on a baby/toddler with other diapers, or if you need diapers that you know you can trust to prevent leaks and last for a prolonged duration (like going out on errands and taking longer than expected between changes).

reviews.name: R&J33
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.review: I’ve been using the Hello Bello Diapers for my little one, and I’m really happy with them. They fit perfectly for babies in the 10-16 lb range and have a soft, cloth-like feel that’s gentle on the skin. The absorbency is great, and I’ve had no leaks or issues with overnight protection. Plus, they’re hypoallergenic, which is a huge plus since my baby has sensitive skin. The 120-count value pack is a fantastic deal, and I love that these diapers are both effective and eco-conscious. Overall, they’re a solid, affordable choice for keeping baby dry and comfortable!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: So, so soft, adorable print.
reviews.review: Wow, these diapers really are cloth-like and super soft! The star print is too cute, great for either both or girl or boy. They fit great and we've had no issues with leaks. So happy to be able to try these for review as I always buy the store brand. My baby is living in luxury in these diapers and I'm highly considering switching, they are THAT good. Price is a little more than I'd like to spend, but as parents, sometimes you have to make sacrifices for your child's comfort, and this would be justified. We love them!

reviews.name: Abby T.
reviews.title: perfect replacement for big name brands
reviews.review: perfect replacement in comparison to big, branded name companies. We like this just as much as we like the members mark diapers. Kiddos seem to not react to these like they did with pampers. Would highly recommend. Design is simple and size is perfect. Definitely does not leak and the adhesive strength on the diaper is par to the member marks. Enough absorbency for the daytime. Unsure for overnight as that can get tricky.

reviews.name: Kelly Walker
reviews.title: Quality Diapers at great price
reviews.review: I have a new grandbaby who is about 2 months old. He is at the lower weight of the recommended size, but it still fits well and prevents leaks. I chose to go up in size only because of past experiences. This set of diapers is a great value, in my opinion. They feel absorbent and soft. I haven't had any problems with skin irritation either and the elastic band around the legs does not cause any discomfort. The design is adorable and neutral for boys or girls. The eco-friendliness of these diapers make me feel better than using anything synthetic or "chemical loaded". I've used these overnight and neither number 1 or number 2 has escaped. I am happy with this and only wish I'd have known sooner. My grandbaby is comfortable and well wrapped in softness around the most sensitive parts.

reviews.name: Hibenz
reviews.title: Exploring options.
reviews.review: Got them to try out the brand. Every parent has their preference in diapers but I like exploring my options. My child ended up with another brand. But worth the try to see what best works for your child.

reviews.name: Brittany A.
reviews.title: Cute Diapers!
reviews.review: Awesome diapers, especially for the price. Didn't have any issues with breakouts. They are durable and stayed together well. Didn't have issues with leaking either. They are a super cute design too. Would recommend!

reviews.name: Jess
reviews.title: Holds solids and liquids well!
reviews.review: Love these diapers for my little one! Soft and very absorbent.

reviews.name: Patti
reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review: This size is hard to find. And these are perfect! Helps keeps my grandson from feeling bad for accidents.

reviews.name: Tabatha L.
reviews.title: Expensive but we like them
reviews.review: Good diapers, used hello brand for some time.

reviews.name: Liz785
reviews.title: Great Diapers
reviews.review: This is my first time trying HelloBello diapers for our baby, and so far so good! We haven’t had any diaper rash issues, and these hold a good amount of moisture - she can wear them through the night and there are no leaks. We have had a few blowouts, however we have learned they are unavoidable at times. They are nice and stretchy, and not too thick. The designs on the diapers are an added bonus, and the price is fair for a more premium diaper.

reviews.name: Bill Thomas
reviews.title: Great Eco-Friendly Diapers – Soft, Absorbent & Adorable
reviews.review:
I got these for my niece, and they’ve been a great switch from other brands. The fit is spot on, they’re soft, and they hold up well without leaks. Plus, they don’t have that weird chemical smell some diapers have.

I we like that they’re plant-based and free of harsh chemicals—no rashes or irritation so far. The designs are cute, though obviously that’s not the main concern. I will say they aren’t the absolute thickest diapers out there, but they do the job well without feeling bulky.

Overall, if you’re looking for quality, non-toxic diapers that don’t cost a fortune, these are a solid choice

reviews.name: blord7777
reviews.title: Good Diapers
reviews.review: These are good diapers and so far, no leaks or blow outs. The designs are cute and they do the job they were meant to. They are a bit more pricier than some other brands but sometimes you get what you pay for.

reviews.name: McSuzleberry
reviews.title: Hypoallergenic
reviews.review:
These Hello Bello Diapers fit well and seem comfortable.
Biggest sell for me is they are hypoallergenic.
Size 4 (22-37 lbs)
84 Count seems to be a great Value for a Pack of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel.
Recommend

reviews.name: SSC
reviews.title: Perfect price for alt uses
reviews.review: Might sound weird but diapers are useful for cleaning up spills and keeping on hand for emergencies because of their absorbency. I keep a couple in the backseat pockets of my cars and I keep a few with my main first aid kit. They’re also great for absorbing pet accidents quickly.

reviews.name: Mick R
reviews.title: love
reviews.review: Amazing quality and price

reviews.name: PAW
reviews.title: Great Coverage
reviews.review: These are nice quality diapers. Elastic to keep the diaper snug around the legs, hook and loop tabs to adjust the fit and a yellow strip that changes color when baby needs changed.

reviews.name: Ask_Krys
reviews.title: Free from toxic ingredients and still good quality
reviews.review:
Great diapers with good ingredients/materials safe for your baby’s bottom.
It’s a great product for parents to be exposed to for their littles.
They’re soft, durable and comparable to honest brand.

reviews.name: Bob Dugas
reviews.title: Simply Diapers
reviews.review:
These are used when our grand daughter comes over. They are sized appropriately and fit fine. As far as absorbency and holding everything in, they do an average job. Not quite as good as the more expensive brands like pampers, but they do a good job for their price. We don't get excited about any design on them, since they are just disposable diapers and are often under clothing, but the design is cute.

The closure holds tight and have not let go even once. No issue with chaffing or binding around the legs. We like them and will consider them when we have to buy more.

reviews.name: Brittany
reviews.title: Great pack of diapers
reviews.review: Hello Bello diapers are fantastic! They’re super soft, hypoallergenic, and gentle on the baby’s skin. The fit is great with no leaks, and they feel just like cloth. The wild cats design is absolutely adorable! Plus, getting 128 in a value pack makes them a great deal. I sent this to my sister-in-law for their baby. It's a great value for the amount it brings. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Adventure Expert
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.review: I started using these as backup and emergency diapers for the children I was watching over. So far, they are working really well and haven't caused any negative reactions. I pulled one out of the package with a ripped waist, but other than that one, these have been great.

reviews.name: Willow
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are a new favorite. They're soft and absorb well. They don't irritate the skin. Love the new designs!

reviews.name: Jared N.
reviews.title: Luxury diaper with the cutest patterns
reviews.review: We have always thought about switching to HelloBello but have stayed with our usual diaper brand. Now that we have our third and final kid, we thought we would try something new and wow - these did not disappoint. These diapers were soft and felt like a luxurious splurge, even though they were very affordable. The leak protection and absorbency is comparable to other brands. These diapers seem to run slightly smaller than other brands, but that isn’t a deal breaker. Having the fun patterns on them seals the deal.

reviews.name: Kayla
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review: These are great diapers. They fit well and work well to keep everything’s here it should be. Easy to use.

reviews.name: JustAnotherMom
reviews.title: So Soft!
reviews.review: I love how soft the Hello Bello Diapers are, not at all like the pampers ones we used previously. The size 4 is a great fit according to the weight range. The adorable star pattern is neutral and modern, but let's be honest, it's all about price. The Hello Bellos are on par with pampers in price, which is awesome. I also like that they're made in the USA and donate diapers to families in need.

reviews.name: April Hiker
reviews.title: Good
reviews.review: I’m really happy with these diapers. They are highly absorbent, and comfy to be worn.

reviews.name: Chelsie Anguiano
reviews.title: great diapers
reviews.review:
I’m incredibly impressed with **Hello Bello Diapers in Size 3 (Wild Cats design)**! They offer a perfect combination of style, comfort, and performance. The adorable wild cats print is such a fun touch that makes diaper changes more cheerful.

**Absorbency:** These diapers are highly absorbent and can last through long naps and even overnight without leaks. They do an excellent job of keeping my little one dry and comfortable.

**Fit:** The size 3 diapers fit my baby (17 lbs) perfectly, with a snug yet gentle fit around the waist and legs. The stretchy tabs make it easy to get a secure fit, which prevents leaks while allowing my baby to move freely.

**Softness:** The material is super soft, which is important for sensitive baby skin. We haven’t had any issues with diaper rashes or irritation since switching to Hello Bello.

**Eco-Conscious:** I also love that Hello Bello prioritizes being eco-friendly while maintaining affordability. It’s nice knowing these diapers are made with plant-based ingredients without sacrificing quality.

**Value:** The 100-count value pack is such a great deal. It’s convenient not having to buy diapers as often, and I appreciate the quality at this price point.

Overall, I highly recommend **Hello Bello Diapers** for any parent looking for a high-quality, stylish, and reliable diaper option. It’s a win-win for both baby and parent!

reviews.name: Customer Reviewer
reviews.title: Good absorbency
reviews.review: My toddler wears a huggies size 4 and this runs a little longer than it does wide. The material was very soft and did not irritate my toddler. It does hold a decent amount of liquid however, I did not find it particularly at keeping dry if the diaper was full (moisture wicking). I would use these during the day time rather than night.

reviews.name: CAM
reviews.title: Wish I’d have tried these sooner
reviews.review: This was my first time using hello Bello diapers for my now almost 3-year-old. I think that these have become my favorite diapers. Not only do they seem to have a great amount of absorbing space, but I noticed that the front is not wet when he pees a bunch like other brands where sometimes the pee will continue to soak through the front or sides of the diaper. There is no smell, and there is no pee smell after they’ve been used. They did not cause any form of chafing on my active boy. I truly think that these are great diapers and will continue to get them!!

reviews.name: Chrystal Cyhaung
reviews.title: love those diaper
reviews.review: Hello Bello offers a value pack of their premium disposable baby diapers in Size 6, designed for babies weighing up to 35 pounds. This particular pack, featuring the charming "Flower Child" design, contains 68 diapers that are not only hypoallergenic but also crafted with a soft, cloth-like texture for enhanced comfort. Having purchased these diapers previously, I can confidently attest to their excellent quality, making them a reliable choice for parents seeking both functionality and gentleness for their little ones.

reviews.name: Christina
reviews.title: Premium diaper
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft and luxurious feeling. My baby does well in them with no rashes. The size fits true to weight advertised.

reviews.name: Don H.
reviews.title: High quality diapers
reviews.review: We use these on our granddaughter and they work really well, no leaks and they fit securely. The cloth feel is really nice when compared to the kinda plasticky feel some of the major name brands have. They definitely feel like an upgrade. The price is good for diapers of this quality. Recommended.

reviews.name: ESIII
reviews.title: Nice diaper
reviews.review:
I ordered these for my nephew. They work great. They fit him nicely and from what I can tell they work just as well as other name brand diapers. He hasn't had any leaks and he's pretty active.

Not much more to say about a diaper. It gets the job done.

reviews.name: Bria
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review:
They’re super soft and gentle on my kiddos skin. They fit well and aren't too tight.
The design options are really cute too. These are surprisingly absorbent given how sustainable the brand is. I didn't expect this level of quality at all!
I love that they’re hypoallergenic and have a very soft feel.
We really like these diapers for their moderate price point and their luxurious quality!

reviews.name: Mizscorpioqueen
reviews.title: Very good
reviews.review: Great quality diapers. Nice and soft holds a lot no leaks.

reviews.name: Customer Review of Product
reviews.title: Great diapers that do what they're supposed to
reviews.review:
These diapers fit really well without being too binding. They were snug without leaving any marks on baby. Because they fit in all the right places, there was no leaking, and I was really pleased with the absorbency of the diapers. They are super soft, too, and feel good to the touch. Baby has had no issues with diaper rash or irritation with these diapers.

They are good looking, too! I'm buying some more for an expectant friend who fell in love with them!

reviews.name: Customer Review
reviews.title: Comfy and cute
reviews.review:
Fit well and are super comfy! size UP in my experience.

The patterns are nice - Our go to is the discounted target up and up brand but this was a nice fancier try for certain. No irritation or leaks as of yet.

reviews.name: L. Hill
reviews.title: Great diapers!
reviews.review: These are really great diapers, I am impressed at the value for the cost. They are soft, have cute patterns, they fit securely and comfortably, and we haven't had any issues with leaks using these, and stored moisture doesn't seem to get to places where it can cause irritation, if that makes sense. They are well designed, and we are very happy with them!

reviews.name: Rocio
reviews.title: Great affordable diapers
reviews.review: Love these diapers. I’ve always used it for my first child and loved how clean the brand is and how absorbent they are. I love the option to choose different designs and overall I think these are great diapers. I will say that I do think they run smaller than most regular brands

reviews.name: FranFran
reviews.title: A little thin but made of eco-friendly material
reviews.review: The order comes with 120 count Hello Bello size two diapers. They are soft, absorbent and fit well within the size range. Basically they work as well as other brands except they are a little thin because of the eco-friendly materials that are used. Good value for the price.

reviews.name: Jimmy
reviews.title: Great diapers - feel very high end!
reviews.review: I may be switching to this brand permanently - they're quite good! They have a nice soft feel to them vs the more plasticly feeling of other diapers, and I was impressed at how easy it was to put it on my child. Didn't have any leaks or other issues, nor did I note any skin irritation. This is great, recommended!

reviews.name: Christopher Wells
reviews.title: Love them!
reviews.review:
We've been using these diapers for awhile now. And we love them! We never have any blowouts, leaks, ect.
They are thin and lightweight.

reviews.name: Kylie
reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
reviews.review: These little diapers are so cute and soft. They fit true to size, and we haven't had any blowouts yet. They're a lot less scratchy than other brands that I've tried.

reviews.name: Lindy Bear
reviews.title: Fantastic diapers!
reviews.review: Excellent quality diapers! Great fit, highly absorbent, and no leaks.

reviews.name: A.L.A.
reviews.title: Do The Job, With No leaks! Individually Wrapped Bundles In A Sturdy Box
reviews.review:
These diapers have worked well for us. They are soft and we have not experienced any leaks. The diapers are high quality and never once have we complained about them!
They come packaged in bundles, so they are easy to store and stash. Also, they arrive in a sturdy box, which can be easily recycled.

reviews.name: noodlebutt
reviews.title: May be switching to this brand permanently!
reviews.review: We’re on kid #2 and have been using the same brand of diapers since kid #1. But these might be my new favorite! Granted my 3 month old is on the lower end of the weight for the size 3 diapers so I can’t attest to a bigger kid “blowout” but so far these have been amazing and we have had no leakage escape the diaper. I was impressed by the quality and love the feel vs the normal big name diaper companies. They fit well and have a nice design for keeping everything inside. I feel like they are on par with all the other diaper brands for what you pay and are a good value. I plan to start using this brand more!

reviews.name: Rodnica Ward
reviews.title: Keeps my baby dry
reviews.review: Great diapers, very absorbent, no leakage.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: These diapers have got you covered... (your bottom anyway)
reviews.review:
Hey diaper users! If you need some awesome diapers, Hello Bello Diapers Superstars are the way to go. These are super soft, absorbent, and come in cute designs. Plus, they're plant-based and made without the nasty stuff like parabens and phthalates.

With 120 diapers in a pack, you'll be ready for anything. And bonus points for Hello Bello donating over 7 million diapers to parents in need. These diapers are a win-win!

reviews.name: Heather
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: Hello Bello, Size 2 diapers are soft, absorbent, and great for sensitive skin. They hold up well overnight with no leaks, and the cute designs are a bonus. I love that they're made with eco-friendly materials and free from harsh chemicals. While they fit a bit snug and lack a wetness indicator, they offer great value for a premium diaper. Highly recommend for parents looking for a safe and budget-friendly option!

reviews.name: Elle T.
reviews.title: Upgraded Diapers
reviews.review: I used to think a diaper is a diaper, but these have been so much better! My primary requirements are no leaks and good fit and these diapers are great for that and beyond. They seem to be softer, allowing better and more comfortable movement and the cute designs are a nice bonus.

reviews.name: Zoe
reviews.title: Big fans!
reviews.review: We have used hello bello in our house a few times now and we are very happy with the diapers! We haven’t had any leaking issues so far while using them on my older son or younger daughter. They’re a bit stiffer than other diapers and aren’t as stretchy in the waistband area but they still fit nicely! I love the cute designs they have too! Sets them apart from others.

reviews.name: carp
reviews.title: Great diapers, super cute
reviews.review: Fits perfect for my 4 month old. It’s so high quality and cute, absorbs a lot and no leaks. Bo skin irritation and extremely soft and I love the cute little animal prints. They are a bit pricy but they feel like premium diapers so I think they’re worth it.

reviews.name: Kat K.
reviews.title: Neutral design with stay-put straps!
reviews.review: Hello Bello is such a great diaper brand. They’re a little pricier than some of their competitors, but the quality makes up for the added cost. I love the neutral black star design of these. The Velcro straps stay put, too, and don’t detach. No leaks, good fit, what more could you ask for in a diaper?

reviews.name: StevenJM
reviews.title: High quality
reviews.review:
High quality diapers from a good alternative to standard brands. Has all the features of the name brands with a softer feel. This particular version is very colorful with flowers on a pink background.

The tabs hold firm and the feel against the baby's skin is soft. The diapers hold liquid and solid waste very well. Decent price too.

reviews.name: MN
reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review:
Made in the USA using foreign and domestic parts.

In this set you get for packages of 25 diapers each. I got Size 3 for 14-24 lbs and they fit perfectly as expected. The coverage is good and we haven't experienced any leaks or problems. I like the soft material, which feels very high quality, and doesn't irritate my baby's skin, even with a lot of wiggling. They are easy to put on, take off, and roll up for disposal. For the number of very good diapers you get in this set and the price, it's a great deal.

reviews.name: Joshua Tuano
reviews.title: Comparible to Huggies-branded diapers
reviews.review:
The diapers are pretty flexible and comfortable for my toddler. In terms of smell, it smells like your usual Huggies diaper, and is good at hiding odors and containing leaks.

The orange/yellow color is a nice touch, and the made in USA label gives an extra bit of confidence that this is a product made by someone who cares.

reviews.name: Bella Roberts
reviews.title: No blowouts
reviews.review: I really like these have so much protection against blowouts while being able to ensure that we are using health diapers on my newborn.

reviews.name: Jeanette
reviews.title: Hello Bello
reviews.review: These diapers have worked great. They seem comfortable and absorbent.

reviews.name: Caroline
reviews.title: well absorb and soft diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are soft for my 3 month-old boy. They absorb well without any leak. The size runs well and tapes are strong for active babies moving a lot.

reviews.name: Dan T
reviews.title: High Quality
reviews.review: The first thing you will notice about these diapers is how soft they are. They have held up well, no leaks, fasteners are strong and do not come undone easily. Highly recommend! Would purchase again!

reviews.name: Patrick Garon
reviews.title: Good value
reviews.review: These diapers are pretty comparable to other brands. They have a nice cottony feel and the designs are cute. So far, there haven't been any leaks, which is a win. They're a great choice!

reviews.name: Honest Reviewer
reviews.title: Great quality and cute
reviews.review: These are a nice quality and hold well. My son frequently has loose stools and we have not had any blowouts. I do think next time I am going to size up though. He is only 24 pounds but we typically use Walmart's brand of diapers and these fit slightly more snug. I cannot speak for the smaller sizes but they're not quite as soft as I would expect out of a higher end diaper.

reviews.name: JSFox
reviews.title: Great diapers, soft on baby skin
reviews.review: I've never tried this brand before and decided I'd check them out for my 19 month-old. The size 4 was true to size and the cute, bright colors and design were the first thing I noticed when I opened the box. They are all over a bright red/orange color with sunflowers all over. Super cute! I haven't had any problems with leaks (even after long days away from home with my baby when it's hard to get regular diaper changes done). Sometimes other brands I use have scratchy spots on the waistband that irritate my baby's skin, but I haven't noticed problems with these. The tabs for securing the diaper haven't torn or come off which is also nice to not have to deal with in the middle of a frantic, wiggly diaper change battle! I'd say these are definitely some of the better diapers I've used.

reviews.name: Adri Bee
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: These diapers have a cute floral deisgn, would be great to keep for your child, or even gifting as a baby shower present! There was no skin irritation, leakage, and they are a good quality for the price

reviews.name: Crystal
reviews.title: Amazing Quality Diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are simply amazing. I’ve struggled with other diapers and constant blowouts but haven’t had any issues with these. They have great absorbency and don’t seem to leak like other diapers I’ve experienced. They’re also very gentle on my toddler's skin and she is not irritated by them. They’re very soft and have a thick quilt like feel to them and fit perfectly. They also have cute designs although to me that doesn’t matter as much. They’re worth the extra cost for a high-quality diaper.

reviews.name: Steph
reviews.title: Good quality diapers
reviews.review: I picked this up for an infant in my life, and mama is very happy with these. They are quite absorbent and, so far, no reports of any leakage, much like other diapers on the market. What sets these apart is the fun design, it just adds a little bit of levity to diaper changing time.

reviews.name: Tommy Sze
reviews.title: Works as expected.
reviews.review: I like this diaper a lot because it is soft and comfortable for my daughter and it fits her well and hold up very well as well. Also, I like this individual packed because I can carry it when I go out.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: Good diapers!
reviews.review: They work well and fit as expected.

reviews.name: AJ
reviews.title: Cute, soft, and good at preventing leaks
reviews.review: I really like using this brand. The diapers are cute and soft and they work pretty well in terms of weeks. I've yet to find a diaper that really can stop a full-on blowout, but these do a very nice job. It's a good value as well. If you don't have a baby yourself this is really good brand to give for like a baby shower.

reviews.name: Jessica Timpson
reviews.title: diapers
reviews.review: I primarily use cloth diapers but these are nice to have if we're going on a long car ride or an outing for a while. They work like diapers are supposed to work!

reviews.name: Christy
reviews.title: More natural and made in the USA
reviews.review: Baby hasn't arrived yet so we haven't seen how they handle blowouts, but the material is very soft. Diapers are notorious for having terrible chemicals in them, so I am pleased to try these more natural ones. Made in the USA.

reviews.name: Katie
reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review: Love these diapers! These are a great product and hold up really well. Glad to have them!

reviews.name: GC and PC
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: We are very happy with this box of 100 disposable diapers. The star pattern is very neutral, and we really like the ultra-thin style with great absorbency. There also is a wetness indicator, which is so helpful. The diapers securely close and have a good stretchy waste. And the best part, they are made in the USA! Definitely recommend.

reviews.name: Mike
reviews.title: very good
reviews.review:
Great diapers. The fit very well and looks like they stay in place. The absorbency is great and there were no leak issues. They feel very soft too touch. The material feels good on skin.
The print is a really nice addition too.
Considering you get 128 nappies in the pack I think they're pretty affordable.
I'd definitely recommend them.

reviews.name: Daniel L.
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: Great quality and leak free, love the design.

reviews.name: Chickadee Chatter
reviews.title: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 6 (35 lbs)
reviews.review: These prints are super cute. They seem to fit comfortably and stay in place even with lots of movement. They prevent most leaks and do what they’re supposed to do. They’re kind of spendy, but diapers are kind of spendy and I like that these work well.

reviews.name: K.
reviews.title: Very Absorbent - Cute Design
reviews.review: These diapers work great! They’re super absorbent and keep leaks at bay, even overnight, which is a big deal for us. The soft, cloth-like material feels gentle on my child’s sensitive skin, and we haven’t experienced any irritation or rashes. I also love the cute design - it adds a fun touch to diaper changes. Overall, they’re reliable, comfortable, and worth the investment!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: Good diapers!
reviews.review: They work well and fit as expected.

reviews.name: AJ
reviews.title: Cute, soft, and good at preventing leaks
reviews.review: I really like using this brand. The diapers are cute and soft and they work pretty well in terms of weeks. I've yet to find a diaper that really can stop a full-on blowout, but these do a very nice job. It's a good value as well. If you don't have a baby yourself this is really good brand to give for like a baby shower.

reviews.name: Stacy
reviews.title: Wonderful diapers
reviews.review: Nice and absorbent. My son didn’t have a leak or blowout in these. They are a great value for the money.

reviews.name: Ms. Lee
reviews.title: Baby approved
reviews.review: This is a great value for a big box of diapers. They are soft, durable, and provide a leakproof fit. We have watched my nephew scoot around with these on and they have held up well.

reviews.name: D. W.
reviews.title: Accurate sizing, fit well and hold a reasonable amount
reviews.review:
Got these primarily as a just in case, but tested one against another brand for size, fit and "capacity".

The are sized appropriately for the weight and match the sizing of the bigger brand names. The capacity is a little less as they are a little thinner, but they are also not using the same type of absorbent material (because they are being eco-conscious) so that is to be expected.

They work well, don't sag, don't leak unless you've put them on wrong or there was a blowout or a gusher, and if you've had kids, you know exactly what I'm talking about and that no brand is going to truly contain those messes.

These are a little more expensive per diaper than the bigger brands ($37.99/120 at time of review), but again, I'm supportive of the eco and baby friendly ingredients.

reviews.name: LMK
reviews.title: good quality
reviews.review: We love what this brand is doing with the clean and safe materials, they're soft yet durable with out leaks or irritation.

reviews.name: Natucha
reviews.title: Good organic diapers
reviews.review:
As a parent who has tried numerous diaper brands, I was surprised by the quality and performance of Hello Bello Diapers. As a reference I have used most store brands as well as some organic brands as well.

These diapers standout because of their softness and despite this luxury feel, they hold up pretty well. The design includes a doody-catcher feature but I do think the huggies brand it's better in that area.

As per sizing they seem to run small based on the size chart, so you might want to consider going up a size if your toddler is on the larger end.

It’s important to notice that these diapers are free from parabens and phthalates as that's something important for some parents and a priority for sensitive skin babies.

With 84 diapers in the pack, it’s definitely more expensive than high quality name brands like huggies but relatively similar to other organic brands.

Overall, I'm satisfied with the Hello Bello Diapers as an organic option for everyday use.

reviews.name: Chameleon Eleven
reviews.title: Good Diapers, Cute Design
reviews.review: These Hello Bello Diapers, in the Superstars design, are really cute diapers and more fun than the basic white generic diaper. The design makes them perfect for boys or girls. The size 2 (10-16 lbs.) fit as indicated and includes the yellow urine indicator strip on the front like your name brand diapers do. They feel soft to the touch and seem to also be soft and comfortable to wear without causing any skin irritations. I still think some of the name brands might be a bit softer but not by significant amounts. The absorbency is good for a thin diaper and holds up to nap times without leaking. The value pack seems to offer a pretty good value, and I love that they are made in the USA and that this company gives back, donating over 7 million diapers and wipes to parents in need. That's awesome!

reviews.name: Amazon1966
reviews.title: nice diapers
reviews.review: These are very cute. Not as soft as pampers but not as "crunchy" as Huggies. Seem to be really absorbent, no wetness on the outside of the diaper, and no blowouts either

reviews.name: D. Luu
reviews.title: good quality but wetness detector not so intuitive
reviews.review: Decent quality diapers, easy to strap on the velcro to secure diaper. Contains pee and poo easily but blowouts can still occur. The wetness indicator is not as intuitive though being a shade of green or yellow when changing and starts out at yellow. Other brand diapers just have it change to blue for wet, not these it seems.

reviews.name: tz
reviews.title: Ecofriendly! Yay!
reviews.review:
I love that these diapers are eco-friendly. Since they are eco-friendly, they aren't made with the same materials as regular diapers, and I noticed that they do not have quite as good leakage or capacity. However, it's slight and still worth using these instead of leading brands. They are a bit thinner, but the fit is line with the packaging. I haven't had issues with sagging.

The price aligns with what I would expect from an eco-friendly diaper. It is a little more expensive than the traditional big brands. I've never had a diaper that could prevent a big blow, and these are no different. However, they are great for normal wet and bowel situations.

reviews.name: Dusty
reviews.title: Comparable to Big Name Brands
reviews.review: We have used multiple brands for diapers between our two kids, and appreciated the effectiveness of Hello Bello diapers matching other bigger name brands. The absorption and seal are excellent. The only drawback was the wetness indicator was a bit tough to see a color change.

reviews.name: Bobjaky
reviews.title: They are soft
reviews.review:
We stocked these because we have a lot of friends with older babies and small toddlers. Their children’s weight fell within the range of this size, so we’ve stocked up. These friends stay with us quite often.

I like the convenience of how they’re packaged, in four smaller packages.

They’re a soft diaper that seems to work well. Our friends seem to like them, and the children haven’t say boo.

reviews.name: Shopping Queen
reviews.title: great cost-effective diapers with cute pattern
reviews.review: These size 2 Hello Bello diapers offer good value for the price, with 120 per box being a cost-effective option. They are fairly soft, though probably not quite as soft as other brands. They have some cute patterns as well, with this one being stars. The fit is fairly secure and comfortable, effectively preventing leaks most of the time, though they are not quite as absorbent as others. So far they have proven to be gentle on the baby's skin, as there have been no issues with diaper rash or irritation, but obviously that is dependent on changing them in a timely manner.

reviews.name: The Crow’s Nest
reviews.title: Good baby diapers
reviews.review:
I wish the seller had done a better job with this listing & showed this adorable gender-neutral diaper design in the listing pictures. I also wish the cover picture showed what the product is - the packaging is not correct - they come in clear 'branded' bags (FYI).

As for the diapers, they are pretty good - they are a good size, nice & thick, are fairly absorbent but I am disappointed that they feel damp to the skin when they get 'wet'. They are really soft, truly cloth-like texture, strong Velcro tabs, great elastic leak barriers and have a great gender-neutral star design all over. I love the (non-advertised) wetness detection stripe so you don't have to get up in there to know if it needs to be changed. All in all, not the best diaper but still has great features and works well. I recommend.

reviews.name: LMT
reviews.title: Soft and cute design
reviews.review: These are good quality diapers with a cute design. This is a pack of 84 which is nice sized, soft, organic feel and they hold accidents well. Overall am happy with them.

reviews.name: Dolly
reviews.title: Good Diaper
reviews.review: These Hello Bello Diapers are so cute with the cat print design. I found the diaper to do a good job at being snug at the right areas and the side tabs fit securely. I like that these diapers are hypoallergenic and are made with better plant-based ingredients. They work well for day use but I don't find them as absorbent for overnight use.

reviews.name: LBHReviews
reviews.title: Slightly different look on arrival
reviews.review:
These diapers don't come packaged exactly like the photo shown in the listing - you do get four packages of diapers in the box, but they're in mostly clear bags and not the opaque ones shown in the item's photos.
Not a big deal, just know that what you get may look different than you expect. The design on the diapers is cute, Hello Bello makes a couple different print options if you don't like this particular design.

reviews.name: KL
reviews.title: Great diapers but they are a bit thin
reviews.review:
These are wonderful disposable diapers. They fit really great and they do not leak. That's a major plus obviously.

They are a bit thin so if there's a big load or a significant urine output, well then you might have some seepage and you will need to get them changed out pretty quickly, but otherwise these are very well worth it.

4 stars for me, good diapers.

reviews.name: Tree
reviews.title: Nice Diapers Not Quite as Good as the Leader in Diapers
reviews.review: The diapers are nice - they seem well-made, a little expensive, cute design but sometimes brand names are higher quality and this case...these are comparable to "store" brands, which is not bad...but ok.

reviews.name: By Mark Braun
reviews.title: Cute diapers
reviews.review: Cute diapers and seem to be of good quality. So far no issues, but I've read a lot of complaints about sizing and leaks. I'd definitely start with a small quantity to see how they work for your baby before stocking up!

reviews.name: Lamatzue102002
reviews.title: Functional and more
reviews.review: It is pleasing to open this box of diapers and be greeted with a colorful display as opposed to plain white. As least you are diverted from the task at hand for a little while. The diapers are soft and I love that they are hypoallergenic. They hold the baby output very well. They did not leak and the elastic near the baby will not irritate. There is a double gasket for protection around the legs. I like the way the tabs work, easy to open and close for readjustment.

reviews.name: CL
reviews.title: These diapers are amazing!
reviews.review: They’re super soft and gentle on my baby’s sensitive skin. The flower child design is adorable, and they’re surprisingly absorbent, even overnight. I love that they’re hypoallergenic and have a cloth-like feel. A great choice for parents looking for premium quality at a reasonable price.

reviews.name: MC
reviews.title: Not a daily go to
reviews.review: While these diapers are very cute and are a nice alternative to the mass produced versions, they simply don’t seem to be as absorbent as the name brands.

reviews.name: MS
reviews.title: Well made
reviews.review: These diapers in size 6 are a solid choice for parents seeking a balance between comfort and reliability. This is my first time trying this brand. The hypoallergenic material is gentle on sensitive skin, and the soft, cloth-like feel adds a touch of luxury. They fit well and handle most messes effectively, though occasional leaks can happen overnight. They stick well too! The adorable “Flower Child” design is a fun bonus, making diaper changes a little more cheerful. While slightly pricier than some alternatives, the quality, medium thickness, and thoughtful design make these diapers worth considering. They’re not super bulky, which is great.

reviews.name: Tonilynn Rosario
reviews.title: Premium Hello Bello diapers
reviews.review:
This box comes with 68 diapers that are packaged 17 per bag. The bag they come in is see through and the diapers design is geared for girls. These have a blue line that is noticeable once the diapers are wet with urine. The diapers are soft and has a great leg fit. These were a bit small for niece who wears a 6 ( my opinion these could be a size 5 fit) the velcro is snug and hold up really well , but once wet I feel that there is no dry wicking to get urine off of child and would need to be changed right after.
I do like how soft these are against my granddaughters , but as far as saving me money they just fall short. The price point is average for each package of 17 diapers nothing that would make me change current diapers.

reviews.name: JB
reviews.title: Cute diapers
reviews.review: These Hello Bello diapers are s super cute. They are soft and seem comfortable for the baby. I like that they are hypoallergenic and don't seem to cause any skin irritation. So far these have been holding up very well, no leaks at all. When comparing with other popular brands, these stand out as the superior for us. The price point is a bit higher than some others, but the overall Hello Bello brand has become our favorite for all baby and children's products.

reviews.name: Nadia Ocean
reviews.title: Super Soft! Cushy!
reviews.review: Strong and reliable which is important with a baby who loves blowouts!

reviews.name: Amb
reviews.title: Super soft, but not as absorbent as I'd like
reviews.review: They’re a little taller than the brand name ones we usually get, but not by much, so it works out for my daughter when she’s between sizes. The diapers are softer than the others we use, though a bit thinner. She’s potty training so we haven’t had a lot of soaked diapers. Out of the ones we did have, only two leaked a bit. I'm not sure if it matters, but both times she was sleeping on her belly and some of the wetness was felt through the front of her diaper, not around her legs. I think it’s from how thin the diapers are. Overall they’re fine for her during the day since they’re not getting too wet with the frequent potty visits, but overnight there may be some small leaks.

reviews.name: MBK
reviews.title: Cute prints!
reviews.review: These are cute prints! The flower child one is a bit feminine, but I still put my son in them. My kid is on the smaller size of the weight for a size 4. I found that when he had poops he sometimes leaked the tiniest bit around the leg holes. There is no blowout guard at the top of the back for those wondering. Generally absorbent, but not so much so that I can use it as an overnight diaper.

reviews.name: SoCalGirl
reviews.title: Super Soft, Not the Most Absorbent
reviews.review:
The Hello Bello Wild Cats diapers feature an adorable design and are incredibly soft and comfortable, with plenty of stretch in the leg elastics. The tabs stay secure in place, and they fit my 10-pound niece perfectly. Plus, they're free from harmful chemicals, and the company's values aligns well with our family's.

However, compared to my sister's usual brand, these diapers are slightly thinner and less absorbent. While they've remained accident-free after a week of use, my sister is hesitant to switch brands and wants to see how well these diapers perform as her baby approaches the 12-pound upper weight limit.

reviews.name: More coffee, please
reviews.title: Great fit for big kids
reviews.review: These are really fun diapers that make my 4 year old feel less awkward about still needing to wear diapers to sleep. She is big for her age (about 43 inches, 43 pounds) so we are starting to have a hard time finding something that fits well and is absorbent enough to last all night, but these really fit the bill.
