They are very soft inside - actually softer than the cloth diapers we used when our kids were babies, almost like a tissue, but have been absorbent so far. It's not a big deal in our case but I was surprised that they don't have a wetness indicator, which might be a game changer for an infant or younger kid.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: No blow out barrier in the back
reviews.review: Overall, I love these diapers! The price of $0.28/diaper is comparable to what I pay for Huggies and Pampers, but these have better ingredients and super cute designs. I’ve tried at least 5 different kinds of diapers lately because we keep having issues with blow outs. These diapers are soft and stretchy. The tabs stretch and pull tightly for a nice fit. I don’t have much of an issue with leaks on the sides, and never any issues with urine only, but I’m still getting blow outs up the back. At this point, I think it might be time to size up, but there also isn’t a barrier pocket in the back to keep everything in the diaper. My son is 11 pounds so I got a size 1.

reviews.name: KristyMc
reviews.title: Good alternative to bigger brands
reviews.review: I'm always looking to support better, mindful products that don't use a ton of unnecessary chemicals in their items, and these looked to be a good alternative. They are indeed very soft, but not as thick nor absorbent as the big name established brands. However, for a child is who is starting to transition away from diapers, these are a very good option.

reviews.name: Steven Chang
reviews.title: Soft, Hypoallergenic Baby Diapers with Adorable Prints
reviews.review:
These disposable baby diapers are of excellent quality, featuring an adorable wild cats print. I love that they are hypoallergenic, making them gentle on sensitive skin, and they feel incredibly soft to the touch.

The diapers also absorb quickly, and so far, we haven’t experienced any leakage issues. A reliable and stylish choice for parents looking for comfort and protection for their little ones.

reviews.name: DEEDEE
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: So far the qualities these diapers are good my baby hasn’t had any rash issues as of right now they work perfectly fine. They hold the pee. they hold #2 they’re perfect.

reviews.name: Cam
reviews.title: Good price
reviews.review: These are great diapers for the price. They don’t leak but I feel like they don’t hold as much as other brands. They are soft and have cute designs.

reviews.name: Jenna T
reviews.title: Love the design
reviews.review: A design on a diaper isn't necessary but it adds a bit of fun to something that isn't always fun to take care of. These adorable flower prints bring a bit of whimsy to your day. Comparable to several diaper brands on a price per diaper although a bit higher than I try to go typically. We've had no issues with absorbency and they fit our little one well.

reviews.name: QuirkyGal
reviews.title: Cute print, accurate sizing, underperform compared to Pampers
reviews.review: These diapers are cute and good, but do not hold as much liquid as Pampers or Kirkland brand. However, they are supposed to be made with safer materials, so the trade off depends on what you are looking for from a diaper. The sunflower print is super cute. I find that they can leak if you don’t change after one pee though. They are true to size. I like them over all, but wish the price point was lower considering performance.

reviews.name: Ki
reviews.title: Soft cloth feel, cute print, basic diaper
reviews.review: These diapers have a unique soft cloth like feel and mine had a really cute flower print on them. Although you don't really see the print with pants on, it is a cute touch. I didn't have any issues with leakage or skin irritation so far, they have a standard cuff inside to help with that. The only drawback is the price is higher than compared to other big box brands. However, if you eco-friendly purchases are important to you, these are a good option helping the cause. I know a few of my friends would like these as an option too.

reviews.name: GummyCats
reviews.title: Love these diapers, but not for nighttime.
reviews.review:
I love these diapers for daytime because they’re thin, seem far more comfortable for baby, and they’re adorable. But for nighttime they leak. So a more padded diaper for nighttime and these diapers for move-ability and comfort for the daytime.
These do not bother the baby’s skin at all whether it’s dry or wet which is amazing.
I feel very comfortable with these diapers and this brand.

reviews.name: ✨Mr. King
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review:
Got this for my 3 months old baby girl.
Cute and soft.
She has really sensitive skin, and this diaper won't harm her skin.
It doesn't leak.
Not that stretchable.
It is also kind of thin.
It is okay now for my baby girl, as I change her diaper every time when it is wet.
If it is for older stage of baby, it might not be a good option as it is kind of thin.
It won't absorb as much, and might cause leakages.

reviews.name: Christine James
reviews.title: Ok diapers overall
reviews.review: We love trying new diapers to compare to the usual brand we use. These diapers fit pretty well overall and have pretty secure attatchment tabs. The diapers were ok during the day but we had to monitor them over night after having a few leaks.

reviews.name: Reviewer
reviews.title: Premium Diapers!
reviews.review: Hello Bello Diapers have the cutest prints! I just love these diapers for my granddaughter. They are great for her sensitive skin and she has had no breakouts from them. The only downside is they are not as absorbent as other diapers we have used. So far she has not had any major leaks but I think as she gets older that could be a problem with these diapers. They seem a little skinnier than other diapers.

reviews.name: Scott
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: Diapers are not cheap and these seem decent enough with a cute pattern although most people don’t care about the pattern but the leakage protection. I wouldn’t say they are up there with the premium diapers but they are ok and do what they are supposed to do.

reviews.name: Scientific Baking
reviews.title: Nice diapers with fun design
reviews.review:
Hello Bello Diapers are super cute with the flower design. They make it fun for your little one to wear. The diapers are soft. The ruffles around the leg openings are large and help prevent blowouts.

It is nice to have diapers on hand when taking care of our grandchild. This size range should last for quite awhile.

reviews.name: J. Lam
reviews.title: surprised witht he color
reviews.review: So typical diapers are primarily white and possible with colored decor. These are not. Don't get me wrong, they are cute and give a new breath to boring white diapers. They are super absorbent, and they are easily put on. The designs are cute and these are quite easy to dispose of in a tight smelly ball.

reviews.name: Suzanne R. Arnholt
reviews.title: They work
reviews.review: These are being used on a 5 month old baby, and they work as diapers should. They contain output and don't irritate the little one's skin. Seal easily, no problems.

reviews.name: Miranda
reviews.title: Hello Bello Premium Diapers
reviews.review: These Hello Bello Premium Diapers come in a huge pack of 84 diapers. I got a size 4 and they fit well. They're absorbent and they seem comfortable to wear. They're hypoallergenic so they help with diaper rash. They have cute little designs on them. These would make a great gift for someone. They're also plant-based and safe to use on babies delicate skin.

reviews.name: CalmVibes
reviews.title: Soft but not absorbent
reviews.review:
Pros:
- Very soft
- ⁠Cute design
- ⁠No odor
- ⁠The blowout barrier ruffles are very wide

Cons:
- No wetness indicator (does not have the yellow/blue line that many other brands have)
- ⁠Feels less absorbent. When I change my baby’s diapers after using these, his skin seems more irritated, red, and wrinkly than when using Huggies or Kirkland.

reviews.name: Austin Cho
reviews.title: Came with good amount for money, no leaks
reviews.review: This came with a healthy amount of diapers and they didn’t leak at all.

reviews.name: Karen R. Dailey
reviews.title: High quality diapers - but you pay for it!
reviews.review: We are very pleased with these in terms of quality. They are durable, very absorbent, great fit, and have a fun design. If you want a top notch diaper for your kiddo, these are perfect for you (especially with the hypoallergenic and eco-friendly perks). The one drawback is the price. We will probably continue to use our more budget friendly brand, but can't deny how good these are!

reviews.name: OneByOne
reviews.title: good quality
reviews.review:
Hello Bello Premium Diapers Size 5 I 18 Count (Pack of 4) Disposable, Extra-Absorbent, Hypoallergenic, and Eco-Friendly Baby Diapers with Snug and Comfort Fit I SunnySide Up Pattern Value Pack (72 CT)

The diaper was soft and absorbed well.
The fit can be adjusted by the velcro.

reviews.name: Bonnie
reviews.title: Softest diaper I've EVER seen!
reviews.review: These are super soft. The inside feels like a soft blanket; the softest diaper I’ve ever felt. It’s thick and I love the feel of them, but I don’t think they hold up any better than the cheaper ones I buy. The animal print is fun. The fit is perfect. Nice that they are eco-friendly and hypo-allergenic. Best feature is it’s softer than any diaper I’ve seen. Four stars mostly because of the price and how that compares to others I buy.

reviews.name: WaSmA
reviews.title: Nice diapers.
reviews.review:
This is a modal window.

No compatible source was found for this media.
These are good quality diapers.
It's okay in softness but great for absorbency, and leakage.

reviews.name: J C
reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.review: First time trying this brand, pretty absorbent! I wish there was a wet line indicator, but because it absorbs so much it isn’t hard to tell.

reviews.name: Tyler
reviews.title: This diaper fits like a glove.
reviews.review: This diaper fits like a glove. They are precious so make sure you take care of yours and have them feeling comfy and clean.

reviews.name: J C
reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.review: First time trying this brand, pretty absorbent! I wish there was a wet line indicator, but because it absorbs so much it isn’t hard to tell.

reviews.name: Victoriahannah
reviews.title: They are ok
reviews.review: I don’t love them. Only the back stretches which ends up leaving a gap on my babies behind.

reviews.name: Laszlo Cravensworth
reviews.title: works ok
reviews.review:
So these are ok diapers.
Were not the most absorbent but did the job and the families baby.
No strange smells or odors.
No leakage.
came in handy

reviews.name: Someone’s Mama
reviews.title: Not really impressed
reviews.review:
I’ve heard great things about this brand but to be honest, I’m not super impressed.
I’ve been using rascal and friends diapers for my little ones since my toddler was born, but I wanted to branch out to see if maybe there are better diapers out there, but so far I’ll be sticking with those.
These ones feel very thin and papery. And my 8 month old had a leaky diaper after just wearing for 2.5 hours, so definitely wouldn’t trust to have my little ones wear through the night.
Not only is the quality far lower, but the cost of this pack is double what I pay for R&F for a comparable amount.
I think the only advantage are these have cuter designs, but I mean my babies’ booties are always covered anyways and the diapers go straight to the trash so I am not super concerned about the look of them.
These are fine to have on hand in case you run out or to keep a few in the car for on the go, but I won’t be using these regularly unfortunately

reviews.name: Mad Cassandra
reviews.title: Functional but expensive
reviews.review: These diapers do the job of keeping the pee and poop contained. They seem to fit fine. I like the idea that they are hypoallergenic and don't have any toxic substances in them. However, they are double the price of Luvs diapers. I'm not sure I can justify paying that for a diaper. Additionally, they aren't the easiest to put on. The velcro tabs are the same color as the diaper so figuring out front to back can't be done with a quick glance. This gives my toddler granddaughter just enough time to allegator roll out of position. I need a different color tab or a design element that says "BACK" or something. I would get them if I felt super strongly about the toxin issue, but I think I'll reserve that for her food.

reviews.name: lizzette martin
reviews.title: Hello bello diapers
reviews.review: I find these diapers run a little smaller than other brand diapers . For me they don’t offer as much stretching and blow up protection . They are just decent and get the job done .

reviews.name: D. Su
reviews.title: Could be more absorbent
reviews.review: This was size 6 diaper purchase for my way too large niece who's in the process of getting potty trained. The sunflowers are such a cute design and the outside material is incredibly soft (to the likes of the much more expensive Millie Moon brand). The fitment is good and no issues with blowout yet, but it definitely does not have as much absorbent material as some of the other name brands. Some wetness/moisture can be detected after a few hours. These diapers would be nice for parents are on on top of their changing routine during the day and wears other diapers at night.

reviews.name: T R
reviews.title: Thin
reviews.review: These diapers are extremely thin. I don’t expect them to hold too much urine and I would be careful with leaking. With these diapers, changing frequently is recommended. They’re not the softness but I appreciate that they are eco-friendly. The design on are them are decent. I think a big selling point is the decent quality and quantity for the price.

reviews.name: Vine Reviewer
reviews.title: Cute look, poor absorbency
reviews.review: These disposable diapers seem to be sold primarily for their looks — the outer layer is printed with an attractive pattern, though it’s far more muted and pink than the bright red shown in the product listing. The diapers themselves are nothing to write home about. They’re quite thin and have massively less absorbency and liquid capacity than regular Huggies or other basic brands. I found mine leaked as well, once filled a bit. Not the greatest on functional grounds, and they need frequent changes, though the look is nice.

reviews.name: Diverse Goods
reviews.title: Not well packaged
reviews.review: These seem like great diapers. They are very soft and the design is exactly like pictured and very cute. They are unscented which is what I was looking for. They have large baffles but they don't seem to absorb pee as well, or perhaps it's the protective layer between the skin and the absorptive layer isn't as good, I'm not sure, so I don't use them for overnights but they are great for on the go during the day. The issue I have is that the box of diapers did not come with 4 bags of 18. The diapers were instead all loose in the large box which made me wonder if they were a returned item and that's a big no for me.

reviews.name: B Vine
reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.review: I’ve seen much cuter prints - the one I received was kind of weird, just wasn't very aesthetically pleasing. I realize the diaper will be covered most of the time by clothes but it's nice to have something you don't mind seeing all the time. The quality is OK, but I still greatly prefer Huggies Little Movers especially for booty blowout control. I would even rank Member's Choice and Kirkland diapers well above these both in function and price.

reviews.name: P. Harvey
reviews.title: Sized small
reviews.review: Didn't get to really use them because they don't fit well. Size 5 fit more like a 4. Seem to be decent quality, just make sure to get a size up from what you actually need.

reviews.name: Erica Powell
reviews.title: They're ok
reviews.review: The absorption is ok, nothing other brands that are cheaper can't compete with. The print is ugly, but that's not important. I did notice some leakage with these that other brands don't give me that issue. I do wish these also had the size somewhere on the diaper, I have these in a size 5 and have accidentally grabbed the size 5’s when i was opening a new sleeve of diapers.

reviews.name: B Vine
reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.review: I’ve seen much cuter prints - the one I received was kind of weird, just wasn't very aesthetically pleasing. I realize the diaper will be covered most of the time by clothes but it's nice to have something you don't mind seeing all the time. The quality is OK, but I still greatly prefer Huggies Little Movers especially for booty blowout control. I would even rank Member's Choice and Kirkland diapers well above these both in function and price.

reviews.name: P. Harvey
reviews.title: Sized small
reviews.review: Didn't get to really use them because they don't fit well. Size 5 fit more like a 4. Seem to be decent quality, just make sure to get a size up from what you actually need.

reviews.name: Lia K
reviews.title: Not worth the cheaper price
reviews.review: My first review, I want to warn parents: there was tons of leakage + blowouts with these diapers, not worth saving a few bucks as we’re going through more diapers because they suck so much. Purchase only if you like pee and poo up your baby’s back.

reviews.name: Eloiny
reviews.title: Hello Bello Diapers
reviews.review: These fit just a tad bit larger than Luvs. For the money, you really don't get a lot. My son is a heavy wetter and the first few nights he soaked through. I am not one to do absorbency tests but I honestly haven't been impressed. I notice the same chemical smell as other diapers. My son hasn't had any skin issues with these though. I think I'll stick to my other diaper brand for over night since I've had too many leakages with these.

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Hello bello diapers
reviews.review: I wanted so badly to love these diapers but the quality just wasn’t great. My baby broke out in a rash on her privates the very first day she wore these.

reviews.name: PartyofFive
reviews.title: Rough material
reviews.review: Not a fan of these diapers. We use pampers and these just feel so rough compared to them. Will be sticking with pampers.

reviews.name: Margarita L.
reviews.title: Not the same quality anymore!
reviews.review: I’ve been purchasing these for a while now and really loved them, but lately I noticed the quality isn’t the same. It doesn’t leak, but straps are ripping apart and cotton lining residue is terrible and hard to remove from my sons bottom, after taking my baby to his pediatrician we learned this was what has been causing him diaper rashes for the past month or 2. Hello Bello must’ve made changes because I never had that issue before they were perfect no residue no rashes etc (unenrolling from autos subscription)

reviews.name: SoCal143
reviews.title: The absolute worst
reviews.review: I hate these SO MUCH. I wish I could give negative stars. We have a blow out Every. Single. Poop. Even small poops somehow spread and seep out. We’ve only used 1 of the 3 packs but I can’t bring myself to use the rest, I don’t have time for multiple outfit changes every day. Wish I could return.

reviews.name: Ash
reviews.title: These are trash! The company should pay me for wasting my time
reviews.review: This is the worst diaper ever! They’re extremely cheap not soft and my baby has the worst rash after wearing three diapers

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.title: Garbage. Guaranteed blowout.
reviews.review: Wish I could give zero stars. Only buy if you want a guaranteed blow out. EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. Writing this at 3am after BLOWOUT 15 out of 15. Do not buy unless it is your absolute only option.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Bad diapers
reviews.review: This is my first time trying this diaper brand. I like their wipes but the diapers are horrible. There is no absorption whatsoever so my toddlers bottoms end up get soaked. I do not recommend theses diapers at all.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Leaking every time
reviews.review: These diapers just didn’t work for us. They would leak immediately after just 1 wet. I went through 4-6 pairs of pants a day with my child. I threw the rest of the packs away.

reviews.name: Catherine Kisor
reviews.title: Not “leak proof” at all.
reviews.review: My baby had 3 diapers leak the first day trying these. My least favorite diaper we’ve tried so far.

reviews.name: Miranda Perry
reviews.title: Cute but cheap
reviews.review: I have 4 children in diapers, and you’re better off with Huggies or Pampers. These leak so incredibly bad.

products.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers Club Box, Size 3 (14-24 lbs) Parrots and Dinos - 92 Count of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel

reviews.name: Jezalynn
reviews.title: We order them every month.
reviews.review: Best diapers.

reviews.name: ALH
reviews.title: Quality diapers, great value
reviews.review:
PROS: great value for the price; cute prints; very absorbent; adhesive tapes hold well; don't leak easily; seem comfortable and comparable to the big brands, these are a great value

CONS: none

reviews.name: Bay Max
reviews.title: Adorable Patterns & Great Quality – Perfect for My Little One!
reviews.review:
We’ve been using Hello Bello diapers for a while now, and these 92-count diapers with the parrot and dinosaur patterns are a big hit! First off, the designs are so fun and vibrant. The dinosaurs are perfect for my little explorer, and the colorful parrots are just too cute. It’s always a joy to change diapers when the patterns are this playful!

In terms of quality, Hello Bello has always impressed me. These diapers are super absorbent and soft on my baby's skin. No leaks, even overnight, and I haven’t noticed any irritation or rashes. I also love that they’re made with plant-based materials and free from harsh chemicals. It gives me peace of mind knowing I’m using something safe for my baby.

The sizing is spot on, and they fit comfortably without being too tight. Plus, the stretchy waistband and leg cuffs keep everything snug without being restrictive. I’m definitely a fan of these diapers, and I highly recommend them to other parents looking for quality, eco-friendly, and cute diapers!

reviews.name: Zoe
reviews.title: Always reliable
reviews.review: Love the prints and the feel of these diapers. They have rarely led to a blow out and I think they are a good value for the price point. Using them with my second son and they fit great!

reviews.name: SLSREP7850
reviews.title: Very Nice Diapers
reviews.review: Ordered these for my granddaughter and my daughter was thrilled. She was impressed at how absorbent the diapers are, adorable prints on the diapers, fasteners work well, and hugs baby legs without irritating. She like that the diapers are "plant based" (but I have no idea what that means ...) overall, she was happy with this brand of diapers and that they are priced much better than the national brands.

reviews.name: Queen Street
reviews.title: TTS good closure
reviews.review: We tried this brand for the first time. They are as expected for disposable diapers but I noticed the higher quality. They are made nice, stretch in the right places, and are highly absorbent. The design is cute (parrots and dinos). My sister-in-law has used a few while she was traveling with her baby and also said they worked good. I would be happy to use them again as the price was reasonable.

reviews.name: Jodie
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review: My daughter has VERY sensitive skin and these diapers have been great for her! They are high quality and fit her well. The patterns on these are very cute as well and I love that you can buy different patterns. Buying a clubbox helps me save money since we go through so many these days. Fits true to size.

reviews.name: MarVlee
reviews.title: No complaints
reviews.review: These diapers are pretty good quality. I normally use the target brand and these are very similar. No leak issues

reviews.name: Don M
reviews.title: very good quality diapers
reviews.review: The diapers are true to size and fit properly. The stretchy areas around the legs and waist are designed well, to prevent leaks and hold the diaper in place. The box is smaller than other brands with a similar count, so the diapers don't take up a lot of space if you need to keep several cases on hand. The printed pattern looks cute, and kids seem to like the print. I guess the important thing is they work well. I haven't noticed any signs of leakage or soaking through. I'd recommend these to anyone looking for a great diaper for their little ones.

reviews.name: NoneYas1
reviews.title: Great Diapers
reviews.review: I got these for a friend who recently had a baby. She said they're very soft, absorbent, and easy to put on and take off. She also loved the cute patterns as well!

reviews.name: Douglas Scott
reviews.title: Super absorbent….even at night!
reviews.review: Hello Bello Diapers Club Box, Size 3, is a fantastic choice for parents! The Parrots and Dinos design is adorable, and the diapers are incredibly soft with a cloth-like feel, which is gentle on my baby’s skin. I’ve been highly impressed with how well they work overnight—no leaks, even after a whole night of sleep! They’re hypoallergenic, a must for sensitive skin, and provide a snug yet comfortable fit. With 92 diapers in the box, it’s a great value, too.

reviews.name: Jen
reviews.title: Great quality!
reviews.review: Super cute prints! Our guy absolutely loves the dinos! The diapers fit well, without any leaks. We haven't had any issues with his sensitive skin either.

reviews.name: Bettyhop
reviews.title: Love these!
reviews.review: I am not a stranger to the Hello Bello brand diapers and I like the quality that they provide so I was very excited to try the Hello Bello Diapers Club Box, Size 3 (14-24 lbs) Parrots and Dinos - 92 Count. These diapers live up to the Hello Bello brand reputation. I feel like the design is cute and gender neutral. I love the wetness indicator! It is so helpful when you just aren't sure, I wish their larger sizes had this too!

reviews.name: VaJayJay
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review: These diapers fit true to size. They are gentle on the skin and seem to be comfortable for babies. I love the prints on the diapers. Super cute!

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great for gift or just to have
reviews.review: Nice quality diapers. They hold up good on baby and do not leak

reviews.name: 3DPC
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.review: These diapers have amazing absorbency and softness! My baby never tries to take these off! The adorable bird print is a hit with my baby!

reviews.name: ʜᴀᴘᴘʏ ꜱʜᴏᴘᴘᴇʀ
reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.review: These diapers works fine, they hold moisture, and are very soft. Cute designs too. The price makes it a good value.

reviews.name: LoveBooks
reviews.title: these are a great more affordable option
reviews.review: we like hello bello in our home! these diapers are great and if sizing is accurate you will enjoy them

reviews.name: Genesis Roman
reviews.title: Me gusta esta marca pero corre pequeño
reviews.review:
Son bien protectores pero sinceramente pudieran ser mas grande.
Siempre que usaba el tamaño de 1 no sirvieron para ni bebe ya que quedo super pequeño.
Eso que el tenia 9 libras y solo le servian el tamaño 2.
En absorción doy 4/5 estoy teniendo bastante problema porque la pipi se le salen.
La decoración es buena pero hasta ahora para permanecer la noche entera prefiero el modelo de P.

reviews.name: Douglas Scott
reviews.title: Super absorbent….even at night!
reviews.review: Hello Bello Diapers Club Box, Size 3, is a fantastic choice for parents! The Parrots and Dinos design is adorable, and the diapers are incredibly soft with a cloth-like feel, which is gentle on my baby’s skin. I’ve been highly impressed with how well they work overnight—no leaks, even after a whole night of sleep! They’re hypoallergenic, a must for sensitive skin, and provide a snug yet comfortable fit. With 92 diapers in the box, it’s a great value, too.

reviews.name: GrumbleBee
reviews.title: Absorbent Leak Proof Cute Cover Pattern
reviews.review:
What's inside the diaper is best left unsaid. This brand of diaper keeps the ook on the inside, while keeping the baby inside the diaper dry and not cranky.

The patterns are cute as can be. So if ya rock it southern summer style with ya little tyke rolling diapie out they still look cute.

The business of handling business. No leaks. Even on an active baby who seems intent on defeating any claims of leak proof or non-droopy. So far, the baby has not triumphed. The diaper remains the winner.

reviews.name: emilee
reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review: Love these diapers. My boy’s rash was gone right away when I started using Hello Bello. Rarely have any blowouts or leaks. The cute surprise diaper designs are cherry on top. Priced better than other diapers considering excellent quality, durability and absorbent. I like the fit too. No artificial smells

reviews.name: Libby
reviews.title: Soft, Cute, and Eco-Friendly, but Could Be Thicker
reviews.review:
First off, they are incredibly soft, and I love the cloth-like feel. The material is gentle on my baby’s skin, which is really important for us, especially since she has sensitive skin. The adorable designs—parrots and dinos—are just the icing on the cake. It’s hard not to smile when I see how cute they look on her!
Another thing I really like is that these diapers are eco-friendly. They're made using 100% renewable energy, and I feel good knowing they’re from a brand that uses a zero-waste manufacturing process. I try to make more sustainable choices when I can, and it’s nice to see a diaper company leading the charge in that department.
That being said, my only gripe with these diapers is that they could be a bit thicker. They’re super soft, but sometimes I feel like they don’t absorb as much as I’d like, especially overnight.

reviews.name: N
reviews.title: Absorb Well But Not So Much Overnight
reviews.review: These diapers absorb quickly and keep the baby's skin dry, but I find they leak overnight, which isn't as effective as other brands. I see them as better for daytime use.

reviews.name: Tatiana M.
reviews.title: Comfortable diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are very pretty. However, they are thinner than some other brands and less absorbent. They fit my granddaughter well and seem comfortable on her. Occasionally they leak, especially overnight.

reviews.name: Nancy
reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.review: A great box of diapers. Design is colorful and special, makes the diaper changing process more fun than other plain diapers for me.

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.title: Adorable designs
reviews.review: I love these diapers for the fun designs. They are some of the cutest diapers out there. These are absorbent and fit nicely.

reviews.name: Mrs. ChaCha
reviews.title: Soft diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are soft and fit as expected. They are cute but I think they leak too easily, have to go through them quicker than usual to make sure they don't leak out.

reviews.name: M. H.
reviews.title: Not as absorbent as other brands
reviews.review: These diapers fit well and haven't caused any irritation on my baby's skin. I just don't feel like they are as absorbent as the brand I normally buy. They are fine for day time when I know I can change my baby's diaper as soon as it's necessary, but I won't use overnight because they have leaked.

reviews.name: GrumbleBee
reviews.title: Absorbent Leak Proof Cute Cover Pattern
reviews.review:
What's inside the diaper is best left unsaid. This brand of diaper keeps the ook on the inside, while keeping the baby inside the diaper dry and not cranky.

The patterns are cute as can be. So if ya rock it southern summer style with ya little tyke rolling diapie out they still look cute.

The business of handling business. No leaks. Even on an active baby who seems intent on defeating any claims of leak proof or non-droopy. So far, the baby has not triumphed. The diaper remains the winner.

reviews.name: virginia
reviews.title: Leak
reviews.review: I found that these leaked easily it’s almost like they are not absorbent enough? I’m not sure. The design is cute but that’s about it

products.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size Newborn (NB, Up to 10 lbs), 84 Count of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers in Woodland Animals and Koala Kids Designs, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel

reviews.name: Kaden Kennedy
reviews.title: Pampers who? Hello bello beat yo ass covers any day
reviews.review: Just had our first baby and we're gifted all the popular brands (Huggies, pampers, honest, etc) and I bought a few of the lower-tox brands as well. These by far have been our favorites and I will be making this our brand after we finish off what we have. Less leakage than honest, softer than pampers in my opinion, and my son didn't get red like he does with the pampers swaddlers. Love them

reviews.name: Paige
reviews.title: Super soft!
reviews.review: Super soft and super absorbent! I used fort daughter that has super sensitive skin and these are the only diapers she could use. I use them for my second baby now. He’s 10 months old and has had ONE diaper rash and it was while he popped his first tooth so the skin protection is great. They’ve never leaked. Overall, they’re super high quality and definitely great value.

reviews.name: donna
reviews.title: baby stuff
reviews.review: love it

reviews.name: Kaden Kennedy
reviews.title: Pampers who? Hello bello beat yo ass covers any day
reviews.review: Just had our first baby and we're gifted all the popular brands (Huggies, pampers, honest, etc) and I bought a few of the lower-tox brands as well. These by far have been our favorites and I will be making this our brand after we finish off what we have. Less leakage than honest, softer than pampers in my opinion, and my son didn't get red like he does with the pampers swaddlers. Love them

reviews.name: Paige
reviews.title: Super soft!
reviews.review: Super soft and super absorbent! I used fort daughter that has super sensitive skin and these are the only diapers she could use. I use them for my second baby now. He’s 10 months old and has had ONE diaper rash and it was while he popped his first tooth so the skin protection is great. They’ve never leaked. Overall, they’re super high quality and definitely great value.

reviews.name: sam
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.review: These are good diapers, just not the right fit for our son. Blowouts were an issue for us. No skin issues, Velcro never seemed to hold well though.

reviews.name: Ashley
reviews.title: Ok for newborn
reviews.review: Started out good but then when we moved up a size the quality was inconsistent and not great for supporting bigger poops

reviews.name: Sydney Cutter
reviews.title: Ehh. Not terrible
reviews.review:
Bought these for my son as I was previously using pampers and disliked them. I was gifted the hello hello wipes and absolutely love them so I figured why not give their diapers a shot!
They are not great for over night uses. My sons diaper constantly leaked overnight. During they day he didn’t leak as I change his diaper often. They do run a bit small. My son was 6 lbs and I felt they were smaller than other newborn diapers. They do feel weird as if they don’t have enough material to them. I loved the designs.

products.product_name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 4 (22-37 lbs), 74 Count of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers in Wildcats and Snacktime Designs, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Just as good but beware of misleading print advertising
reviews.review:
These are great, they do give off a different feel than lets say the ones I purchase from Walmart; however, I think that because these are super-packages they end up being compressed more than other packages with less diapers—hence a “thinner” appearance. These are still just as absorbent and functional as all other Hello Bello diapers!
My only complaint is that the images are misleading with the prints. I was expecting the cute jungle animals and fruits prints for the size 4 diaper box I ordered. Instead I received the thunder print and forest animals. Sure no one else will see the print, but I was looking forward to the fruits and jungle animals lol

reviews.name: Delilah
reviews.title: Good value for money and soft
reviews.review: These diapers are a really good value for money! They’re also soft. Would buy again

reviews.name: nic
reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review: Used to strictly buy honest diapers, bought these to try and wish we would have switched 2 years ago. Good fit and fun patterns, soft and comfy.

reviews.name: Justine
reviews.title: Best value for price, and cute!
reviews.review: My favorite brand of diapers! No leaks! Super cute! Will always buy.

reviews.name: Daniel McFaul
reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review: Favorite diapers. Good quality. A little pricier compares to some others but worth to have better ingredients. Absorbs good

reviews.name: HollyY
reviews.title: Love these diapers! They are the best!
reviews.review: 100% recommend!! Best diapers ever

reviews.name: Kelsey Warren
reviews.title: Love love love these diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are so cute and i love that they have helped my son avoid diaper rashes. Other brands have left him with rashes and these diapers don't. I wish i had a life time supply!

reviews.name: Jflowers
reviews.title: They work fine. Not my personal favorite.
reviews.review: These diapers are very soft and not bulky at all. They absorb fine. No problems with leaks or blowouts. The only thing I don't care for is when they're wet, they feel like Luvs. They get very gelatinous and squishy which makes me think they're fuller than they are. When I go to change the diaper, I see that it's barely wet. This may only be MY experience. So don't let this dissuade you from purchasing.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: HelloBello Diapers
reviews.review: Great value! The diapers are leak proof and has the cutest designs!

reviews.name: Apriljeanrene
reviews.title: Great diaper for the price
reviews.review: It actually hold a 3 yr olds urine all night. Very few times did he leak through from sleeping in. But the diaper seems to hold fine. They work as good as luvs. They seem to do the same job when it comes to how much they can hold. These seem to be pretty soft & comfortable.

reviews.name: K.A.
reviews.title: Best diapers out there!
reviews.review: I used Hello Bello for both of my kiddos and we absolutely love them. I have used cheaper diapers in the past but they have always lead to diaper rashes for my kiddos. I feel that hello bello diapers are just as good as the highee end brands but half the price.

reviews.name: Adonis
reviews.title: No more late night diaper runs!
reviews.review: We got this subscription right after my third baby was born. We have LOVED it. The diapers don’t leak if you’re in the right size, and they have never caused irritation for baby. The wipes are unscented and nice and thick. We get just enough to last a month, and then the next box is on its way! Getting to pick the fun patterns is a bonus but it is fun to have some funky designs! We have also tried their Everywhere Balm and love it! You can get extra products that come right in your box and just get added to your monthly purchase.

reviews.name: Lindsay A.
reviews.title: Excellent Absorption
reviews.review: I have purchased many diapers in my lifetime (twins and another baby), and these are up there with Pampers in my opinion. I prefer the Amazon brand; however, these were an excellent substitute in a pinch for a delayed order. Stayed dry all night!

reviews.name: Caroline
reviews.title: Dependable Diaps
reviews.review: No leaks and no skin irritation. Charming simple prints and a fair price.

reviews.name: Karini Hinojosa
reviews.title: Un poco más delgado de lo que pensé
reviews.review: Hacen su trabajo pero son muy delgados.

reviews.name: CrabbyLounge9090
reviews.title: No blue line!
reviews.review:
These are your standard diapers.

They do not have that yellow to blue indicator line that a lot of brands use, which makes it a little more time consuming to change my son. But potato tomato. Win some, ya lose some.

reviews.name: Аmazon Customer
reviews.title: Designs aren't as they appear
reviews.review: Diapers seem ok. I purposely chose this pack because of the black lightening bolt design to use as the "tread" on the tires of a diaper truck. The price is very attractive and enticing, but you will regret this. We did not even finish a single box, we ended up throwing them out and going with Pampers!!

They have cute designs just like Honest does too and for a much better price! I’m happy I tried these for my baby.

I see people in the reviews complain about them not being as absorbent as they would like but personally, I would never keep my baby in even a wet diaper knowing he’s uncomfortable. I have an 11 week old baby that sleeps through the night and he doesn’t wake up in discomfort not once for diaper change but he also rarely soils the diaper at night.

Hope this helps other parents!

They don't fall off easy and hold well. I didn't get any spills but then again I try to be attentive about this when these were being used. I was not interested in color or design, I was more concerned with the functionality of the diapers. It performed well for me, so that is all that matters. These worked great for my baby hopefully it may do the same for yours. I recommend these as like everything else, these can add up in cost.

reviews.name: J. W.

reviews.review: No complaints using them on a new born. The baby did not really put them to the test so hard to say how they handle the really tough jobs. They work fine, we may consider them in the future purely for the convenience of having them delivered.

reviews.review: These diapers fit great and stay on with secure tape. They help to prevent leaks and blowouts. They feel comfortable against the skin.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer

reviews.review: I really like these diapers. I think they are a nice, soft, well fitting diaper for my daughter. They had a cute design on them, and they held up overnight. I didn’t experience any leaks while we used them. I think they were thicker then some others that I have used in the past as well. I would say for the price they are worth it.

reviews.name: dtmReviews
reviews.title: A Better Alternative to Toxic Diapers
reviews.review: My first kid got all the privileges of cloth diapering, but I got lax with the second and now with 3 kids pretty much only use disposables. As a 2-time cancer survivor, I try my hardest to keep toxins out of my kids' lives, & I've done tons of research into what chemical contents to avoid, bleaching processes, pulp, etc. I am especially wary of the PFAS (forever chemicals) that are now known to be ubiquitous endocrine disruptors. According to a trusted source, these diapers have tested non-detect for fluorine (ehich would be evidence of PFAS), have a plant-based liner and are free of fragrances and lotions. The only concern is that they do use ECF (elemental chlorine-free) pulp, which may not be entirely free of coloring and can still create disinfection byproducts. So these are not top-rated for non-toxicity but they are infinitely healthier than a lot of alternatives. One reason I am giving them five stars is that they do not offgas any smell when I immediately open the plastic, unlike another brand I was using of supposedly equal quality and safety. They also seem to fit my daughter better. The tabs do sometimes stick together on the unopened diapers, but I haven't accidentally torn any. Overall, if you are looking for a disposable that does not expose your child to the highly suspect chemicals and fragrances used by so many "trusted" Big brands, these diapers are a great, affordable way to go. I will be switching to this brand until I find one without ECF that is still affordable and manages to keep in stock.

reviews.name: Sharon S.
reviews.title: Good Option
reviews.review: Needed one more box while we transition from diapers to "big girl pants>. The convenience and cost of this option made this worth the risk. The Hello Bello Store diapers were a good surprise. They are soft and fit nicely to reduce leaks. They have held up to a very active 2 year old. I wish I had discovered these earlier. I hope to not have to purchase another box of diapers but if I do I will reorder these. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.name: Kris
reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review: These diapers are a great price and great product. We use honest diapers and they fit similar, but have switched to hello bello because they leak less.

reviews.title: Great quality diapers

They're just a little roomy but that's to be expected since I got the 10-16lb sizes. The graphics are cute, they hold everything in really well, and she seems comfortable in them. Not really much more I could ask for.

reviews.review: Great quality diapers that are soft and comfortable. Highly recommended

reviews.name: M.G
reviews.title: Absorbent & Adorable!
reviews.review: Flower child is a simple and elegant design, appreciate the fact that these are chemical free. They are very gentle on my toddler's skin. No rashes its super soft and holds his pee well. Been using for almost a month, no leak yet. Good quality product.

reviews.name: AugustReviews
reviews.title: Premium diapers that hold well
reviews.review:
We often babysit a friend's toddler at our house, and she wears a size 6, so we picked these up to have for her after hearing great things from friends about them.

Glad we did; these are so soft, yet they hold a LOT - no leakage issues yet. The fit is pretty perfect, and they have a leak indicator that works as expected.

Haven't seen any kind of irritation or rashes from these which is another big plus.

They do come at a premium price but they seem well worth it. Would recommend if you're having skin issues on a baby/toddler with other diapers, or if you need diapers that you know you can trust to prevent leaks and last for a prolonged duration (like going out on errands and taking longer than expected between changes).

reviews.name: R&J33
reviews.title: Love these diapers!
reviews.review: I’ve been using the Hello Bello Diapers for my little one, and I’m really happy with them. They fit perfectly for babies in the 10-16 lb range and have a soft, cloth-like feel that’s gentle on the skin. The absorbency is great, and I’ve had no leaks or issues with overnight protection. Plus, they’re hypoallergenic, which is a huge plus since my baby has sensitive skin. The 120-count value pack is a fantastic deal, and I love that these diapers are both effective and eco-conscious. Overall, they’re a solid, affordable choice for keeping baby dry and comfortable!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: So, so soft, adorable print.
reviews.review: Wow, these diapers really are cloth-like and super soft! The star print is too cute, great for either both or girl or boy. They fit great and we've had no issues with leaks. So happy to be able to try these for review as I always buy the store brand. My baby is living in luxury in these diapers and I'm highly considering switching, they are THAT good. Price is a little more than I'd like to spend, but as parents, sometimes you have to make sacrifices for your child's comfort, and this would be justified. We love them!

reviews.name: Abby T.
reviews.title: perfect replacement for big name brands
reviews.review: perfect replacement in comparison to big, branded name companies. We like this just as much as we like the members mark diapers. Kiddos seem to not react to these like they did with pampers. Would highly recommend. Design is simple and size is perfect. Definitely does not leak and the adhesive strength on the diaper is par to the member marks. Enough absorbency for the daytime. Unsure for overnight as that can get tricky.

reviews.name: Kelly Walker
reviews.title: Quality Diapers at great price
reviews.review: I have a new grandbaby who is about 2 months old. He is at the lower weight of the recommended size, but it still fits well and prevents leaks. I chose to go up in size only because of past experiences. This set of diapers is a great value, in my opinion. They feel absorbent and soft. I haven't had any problems with skin irritation either and the elastic band around the legs does not cause any discomfort. The design is adorable and neutral for boys or girls. The eco-friendliness of these diapers make me feel better than using anything synthetic or "chemical loaded". I've used these overnight and neither number 1 or number 2 has escaped. I am happy with this and only wish I'd have known sooner. My grandbaby is comfortable and well wrapped in softness around the most sensitive parts.

reviews.name: Hibenz

reviews.review: Got them to try out the brand. Every parent has their preference in diapers but I like exploring my options. My child ended up with another brand. But worth the try to see what best works for your child.

reviews.name: Brittany A.
reviews.title: Cute Diapers!
reviews.review: Awesome diapers, especially for the price. Didn't have any issues with breakouts. They are durable and stayed together well. Didn't have issues with leaking either. They are a super cute design too. Would recommend!

reviews.name: Patti

reviews.name: Liz785
reviews.title: Great Diapers
reviews.review: This is my first time trying HelloBello diapers for our baby, and so far so good! We haven’t had any diaper rash issues, and these hold a good amount of moisture - she can wear them through the night and there are no leaks. We have had a few blowouts, however we have learned they are unavoidable at times. They are nice and stretchy, and not too thick. The designs on the diapers are an added bonus, and the price is fair for a more premium diaper.

reviews.name: Bill Thomas
reviews.title: Great Eco-Friendly Diapers – Soft, Absorbent & Adorable
reviews.review:
I got these for my niece, and they’ve been a great switch from other brands. The fit is spot on, they’re soft, and they hold up well without leaks. Plus, they don’t have that weird chemical smell some diapers have.

I we like that they’re plant-based and free of harsh chemicals—no rashes or irritation so far. The designs are cute, though obviously that’s not the main concern. I will say they aren’t the absolute thickest diapers out there, but they do the job well without feeling bulky.

Overall, if you’re looking for quality, non-toxic diapers that don’t cost a fortune, these are a solid choice

reviews.review:

Not quite as good as the more expensive brands like pampers, but they do a good job for their price. We don't get excited about any design on them, since they are just disposable diapers and are often under clothing, but the design is cute.

The closure holds tight and have not let go even once. No issue with chaffing or binding around the legs. We like them and will consider them when we have to buy more.

reviews.name: Brittany
reviews.title: Great pack of diapers
reviews.review: Hello Bello diapers are fantastic! They’re super soft, hypoallergenic, and gentle on the baby’s skin. The fit is great with no leaks, and they feel just like cloth. The wild cats design is absolutely adorable! Plus, getting 128 in a value pack makes them a great deal. I sent this to my sister-in-law for their baby. It's a great value for the amount it brings. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Adventure Expert
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.review: I started using these as backup and emergency diapers for the children I was watching over. So far, they are working really well and haven't caused any negative reactions. I pulled one out of the package with a ripped waist, but other than that one, these have been great.

reviews.name: Willow
reviews.title: Diapers
reviews.review: These diapers are a new favorite. They're soft and absorb well. They don't irritate the skin. Love the new designs!

reviews.name: Jared N.

reviews.review: We have always thought about switching to HelloBello but have stayed with our usual diaper brand. Now that we have our third and final kid, we thought we would try something new and wow - these did not disappoint. These diapers were soft and felt like a luxurious splurge, even though they were very affordable. The leak protection and absorbency is comparable to other brands. These diapers seem to run slightly smaller than other brands, but that isn’t a deal breaker. Having the fun patterns on them seals the deal.

reviews.name: Kayla
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review: These are great diapers. They fit well and work well to keep everything’s here it should be. Easy to use.

reviews.name: JustAnotherMom
reviews.title: So Soft!
reviews.review: I love how soft the Hello Bello Diapers are, not at all like the pampers ones we used previously. The size 4 is a great fit according to the weight range. The adorable star pattern is neutral and modern, but let's be honest, it's all about price. The Hello Bellos are on par with pampers in price, which is awesome. I also like that they're made in the USA and donate diapers to families in need.

reviews.name: April Hiker
reviews.title: Good
reviews.review: I’m really happy with these diapers. They are highly absorbent, and comfy to be worn.

reviews.name: Chelsie Anguiano
reviews.title: great diapers
reviews.review:
I’m incredibly impressed with **Hello Bello Diapers in Size 3 (Wild Cats design)**! They offer a perfect combination of style, comfort, and performance. The adorable wild cats print is such a fun touch that makes diaper changes more cheerful.

**Absorbency:** These diapers are highly absorbent and can last through long naps and even overnight without leaks. They do an excellent job of keeping my little one dry and comfortable.

**Fit:** The size 3 diapers fit my baby (17 lbs) perfectly, with a snug yet gentle fit around the waist and legs. The stretchy tabs make it easy to get a secure fit, which prevents leaks while allowing my baby to move freely.

**Softness:** The material is super soft, which is important for sensitive baby skin. We haven’t had any issues with diaper rashes or irritation since switching to Hello Bello.

**Eco-Conscious:** I also love that Hello Bello prioritizes being eco-friendly while maintaining affordability. It’s nice knowing these diapers are made with plant-based ingredients without sacrificing quality.

**Value:** The 100-count value pack is such a great deal. It’s convenient not having to buy diapers as often, and I appreciate the quality at this price point.

Overall, I highly recommend **Hello Bello Diapers** for any parent looking for a high-quality, stylish, and reliable diaper option. It’s a win-win for both baby and parent!

reviews.name: Customer Reviewer
reviews.title: Good absorbency
reviews.review: My toddler wears a huggies size 4 and this runs a little longer than it does wide. The material was very soft and did not irritate my toddler. It does hold a decent amount of liquid however, I did not find it particularly at keeping dry if the diaper was full (moisture wicking). I would use these during the day time rather than night.

reviews.name: CAM
reviews.title: Wish I’d have tried these sooner
reviews.review: This was my first time using hello Bello diapers for my now almost 3-year-old. I think that these have become my favorite diapers. Not only do they seem to have a great amount of absorbing space, but I noticed that the front is not wet when he pees a bunch like other brands where sometimes the pee will continue to soak through the front or sides of the diaper. There is no smell, and there is no pee smell after they’ve been used. They did not cause any form of chafing on my active boy. I truly think that these are great diapers and will continue to get them!!

reviews.name: Chrystal Cyhaung
reviews.title: love those diaper
reviews.review: Hello Bello offers a value pack of their premium disposable baby diapers in Size 6, designed for babies weighing up to 35 pounds. This particular pack, featuring the charming "Flower Child" design, contains 68 diapers that are not only hypoallergenic but also crafted with a soft, cloth-like texture for enhanced comfort. Having purchased these diapers previously, I can confidently attest to their excellent quality, making them a reliable choice for parents seeking both functionality and gentleness for their little ones.

reviews.name: Christina
reviews.title: Premium diaper
reviews.review: These diapers are so soft and luxurious feeling. My baby does well in them with no rashes. The size fits true to weight advertised.

reviews.name: Don H.
reviews.title: High quality diapers
reviews.review: We use these on our granddaughter and they work really well, no leaks and they fit securely. The cloth feel is really nice when compared to the kinda plasticky feel some of the major name brands have. They definitely feel like an upgrade. The price is good for diapers of this quality. Recommended.

Not much more to say about a diaper. It gets the job done.

reviews.name: Bria
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.review:
They’re super soft and gentle on my kiddos skin. They fit well and aren't too tight.
The design options are really cute too. These are surprisingly absorbent given how sustainable the brand is. I didn't expect this level of quality at all!
I love that they’re hypoallergenic and have a very soft feel.
We really like these diapers for their moderate price point and their luxurious quality!

reviews.name: Mizscorpioqueen
reviews.title: Very good
reviews.review: Great quality diapers. Nice and soft holds a lot no leaks.

reviews.name: Customer Review of Product
